2023-12-08 16:39:26.912 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (8ms) [Parameters=[@__Parse_0='?' (DbType = Guid)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [t].[ID], [t].[CreatedDate], [t].[Name], [t].[Price], [t].[Stock], [t].[UpdatedDate], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID], [t0].[ID], [t0].[CreatedDate], [t0].[Discriminator], [t0].[FileName], [t0].[Path], [t0].[StorageType]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(1) [p].[ID], [p].[CreatedDate], [p].[Name], [p].[Price], [p].[Stock], [p].[UpdatedDate]
    FROM [Products] AS [p]
    WHERE [p].[ID] = @__Parse_0
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [p0].[ProductsID], [t1].[ID], [t1].[CreatedDate], [t1].[Discriminator], [t1].[FileName], [t1].[Path], [t1].[StorageType]
    FROM [ProductProductImageFile] AS [p0]
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT [f].[ID], [f].[CreatedDate], [f].[Discriminator], [f].[FileName], [f].[Path], [f].[StorageType]
        FROM [Files] AS [f]
        WHERE [f].[Discriminator] = N'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS [t1] ON [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID] = [t1].[ID]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[ID] = [t0].[ProductsID]
ORDER BY [t].[ID], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]

    [ID] uniqueidentifier NOT NULL,
    [BasketId] uniqueidentifier NOT NULL,
    [ProductId] uniqueidentifier NOT NULL,
    [Quantity] int NOT NULL,

SELECT @var0 = [d].[name]
FROM [sys].[default_constraints] [d]
INNER JOIN [sys].[columns] [c] ON [d].[parent_column_id] = [c].[column_id] AND [d].[parent_object_id] = [c].[object_id]
WHERE ([d].[parent_object_id] = OBJECT_ID(N'[Baskets]') AND [c].[name] = N'UserId1');

2023-12-10 17:53:37.649 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (36ms) [Parameters=[@__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [t].[ID], [t].[Name], [t].[Price], [t].[Stock], [t].[CreatedDate], [t].[UpdatedDate], [t0].[ID], [t0].[CreatedDate], [t0].[Discriminator], [t0].[FileName], [t0].[Path], [t0].[StorageType], [t0].[Showcase], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]
FROM (
    SELECT [p].[ID], [p].[Name], [p].[Price], [p].[Stock], [p].[CreatedDate], [p].[UpdatedDate]
    FROM [Products] AS [p]
    ORDER BY (SELECT 1)
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t1].[ID], [t1].[CreatedDate], [t1].[Discriminator], [t1].[FileName], [t1].[Path], [t1].[StorageType], [t1].[Showcase], [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [p0].[ProductsID]
    FROM [ProductProductImageFile] AS [p0]
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT [f].[ID], [f].[CreatedDate], [f].[Discriminator], [f].[FileName], [f].[Path], [f].[StorageType], [f].[Showcase]
        FROM [Files] AS [f]
        WHERE [f].[Discriminator] = N'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS [t1] ON [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID] = [t1].[ID]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[ID] = [t0].[ProductsID]
ORDER BY [t].[ID], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]

SELECT [t].[ID], [t].[Name], [t].[Price], [t].[Stock], [t].[CreatedDate], [t].[UpdatedDate], [t0].[ID], [t0].[CreatedDate], [t0].[Discriminator], [t0].[FileName], [t0].[Path], [t0].[StorageType], [t0].[Showcase], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]
FROM (
    SELECT [p].[ID], [p].[Name], [p].[Price], [p].[Stock], [p].[CreatedDate], [p].[UpdatedDate]
    FROM [Products] AS [p]
    ORDER BY (SELECT 1)
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t1].[ID], [t1].[CreatedDate], [t1].[Discriminator], [t1].[FileName], [t1].[Path], [t1].[StorageType], [t1].[Showcase], [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [p0].[ProductsID]
    FROM [ProductProductImageFile] AS [p0]
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT [f].[ID], [f].[CreatedDate], [f].[Discriminator], [f].[FileName], [f].[Path], [f].[StorageType], [f].[Showcase]
        FROM [Files] AS [f]
        WHERE [f].[Discriminator] = N'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS [t1] ON [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID] = [t1].[ID]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[ID] = [t0].[ProductsID]
ORDER BY [t].[ID], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]

2023-12-10 17:53:55.814 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (0ms) [Parameters=[@__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [t].[ID], [t].[Name], [t].[Price], [t].[Stock], [t].[CreatedDate], [t].[UpdatedDate], [t0].[ID], [t0].[CreatedDate], [t0].[Discriminator], [t0].[FileName], [t0].[Path], [t0].[StorageType], [t0].[Showcase], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]
FROM (
    SELECT [p].[ID], [p].[Name], [p].[Price], [p].[Stock], [p].[CreatedDate], [p].[UpdatedDate]
    FROM [Products] AS [p]
    ORDER BY (SELECT 1)
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t1].[ID], [t1].[CreatedDate], [t1].[Discriminator], [t1].[FileName], [t1].[Path], [t1].[StorageType], [t1].[Showcase], [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [p0].[ProductsID]
    FROM [ProductProductImageFile] AS [p0]
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT [f].[ID], [f].[CreatedDate], [f].[Discriminator], [f].[FileName], [f].[Path], [f].[StorageType], [f].[Showcase]
        FROM [Files] AS [f]
        WHERE [f].[Discriminator] = N'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS [t1] ON [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID] = [t1].[ID]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[ID] = [t0].[ProductsID]
ORDER BY [t].[ID], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]

) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t1].[ID], [t1].[CreatedDate], [t1].[Discriminator], [t1].[FileName], [t1].[Path], [t1].[StorageType], [t1].[Showcase], [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [p0].[ProductsID]
    FROM [ProductProductImageFile] AS [p0]
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT [f].[ID], [f].[CreatedDate], [f].[Discriminator], [f].[FileName], [f].[Path], [f].[StorageType], [f].[Showcase]
        FROM [Files] AS [f]
        WHERE [f].[Discriminator] = N'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS [t1] ON [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID] = [t1].[ID]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[ID] = [t0].[ProductsID]
ORDER BY [t].[ID], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]

SELECT COUNT(*)

2023-12-10 17:54:07.274 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (1ms) [Parameters=[@__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [t].[ID], [t].[Name], [t].[Price], [t].[Stock], [t].[CreatedDate], [t].[UpdatedDate], [t0].[ID], [t0].[CreatedDate], [t0].[Discriminator], [t0].[FileName], [t0].[Path], [t0].[StorageType], [t0].[Showcase], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]
FROM (
    SELECT [p].[ID], [p].[Name], [p].[Price], [p].[Stock], [p].[CreatedDate], [p].[UpdatedDate]
    FROM [Products] AS [p]
    ORDER BY (SELECT 1)
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t1].[ID], [t1].[CreatedDate], [t1].[Discriminator], [t1].[FileName], [t1].[Path], [t1].[StorageType], [t1].[Showcase], [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [p0].[ProductsID]
    FROM [ProductProductImageFile] AS [p0]
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT [f].[ID], [f].[CreatedDate], [f].[Discriminator], [f].[FileName], [f].[Path], [f].[StorageType], [f].[Showcase]
        FROM [Files] AS [f]
        WHERE [f].[Discriminator] = N'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS [t1] ON [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID] = [t1].[ID]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[ID] = [t0].[ProductsID]
ORDER BY [t].[ID], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]

FROM (
    SELECT [p].[ID], [p].[Name], [p].[Price], [p].[Stock], [p].[CreatedDate], [p].[UpdatedDate]
    FROM [Products] AS [p]
    ORDER BY (SELECT 1)
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t1].[ID], [t1].[CreatedDate], [t1].[Discriminator], [t1].[FileName], [t1].[Path], [t1].[StorageType], [t1].[Showcase], [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [p0].[ProductsID]

    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT [f].[ID], [f].[CreatedDate], [f].[Discriminator], [f].[FileName], [f].[Path], [f].[StorageType], [f].[Showcase]

) AS [t0] ON [t].[ID] = [t0].[ProductsID]

2023-12-10 17:54:52.885 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (4ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM [Products] AS [p]
2023-12-10 17:54:52.897 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (9ms) [Parameters=[@__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [t].[ID], [t].[Name], [t].[Price], [t].[Stock], [t].[CreatedDate], [t].[UpdatedDate], [t0].[ID], [t0].[CreatedDate], [t0].[Discriminator], [t0].[FileName], [t0].[Path], [t0].[StorageType], [t0].[Showcase], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]
FROM (
    SELECT [p].[ID], [p].[Name], [p].[Price], [p].[Stock], [p].[CreatedDate], [p].[UpdatedDate]
    FROM [Products] AS [p]
    ORDER BY (SELECT 1)
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t1].[ID], [t1].[CreatedDate], [t1].[Discriminator], [t1].[FileName], [t1].[Path], [t1].[StorageType], [t1].[Showcase], [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [p0].[ProductsID]
    FROM [ProductProductImageFile] AS [p0]
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT [f].[ID], [f].[CreatedDate], [f].[Discriminator], [f].[FileName], [f].[Path], [f].[StorageType], [f].[Showcase]
        FROM [Files] AS [f]
        WHERE [f].[Discriminator] = N'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS [t1] ON [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID] = [t1].[ID]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[ID] = [t0].[ProductsID]
ORDER BY [t].[ID], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]

SELECT [t].[ID], [t].[Name], [t].[Price], [t].[Stock], [t].[CreatedDate], [t].[UpdatedDate], [t0].[ID], [t0].[CreatedDate], [t0].[Discriminator], [t0].[FileName], [t0].[Path], [t0].[StorageType], [t0].[Showcase], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]
FROM (
    SELECT [p].[ID], [p].[Name], [p].[Price], [p].[Stock], [p].[CreatedDate], [p].[UpdatedDate]
    FROM [Products] AS [p]
    ORDER BY (SELECT 1)
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t1].[ID], [t1].[CreatedDate], [t1].[Discriminator], [t1].[FileName], [t1].[Path], [t1].[StorageType], [t1].[Showcase], [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [p0].[ProductsID]
    FROM [ProductProductImageFile] AS [p0]
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT [f].[ID], [f].[CreatedDate], [f].[Discriminator], [f].[FileName], [f].[Path], [f].[StorageType], [f].[Showcase]

        WHERE [f].[Discriminator] = N'ProductImageFile'

2023-12-10 17:55:38.820 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (0ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM [Products] AS [p]
2023-12-10 17:55:38.823 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (0ms) [Parameters=[@__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [t].[ID], [t].[Name], [t].[Price], [t].[Stock], [t].[CreatedDate], [t].[UpdatedDate], [t0].[ID], [t0].[CreatedDate], [t0].[Discriminator], [t0].[FileName], [t0].[Path], [t0].[StorageType], [t0].[Showcase], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]
FROM (
    SELECT [p].[ID], [p].[Name], [p].[Price], [p].[Stock], [p].[CreatedDate], [p].[UpdatedDate]
    FROM [Products] AS [p]
    ORDER BY (SELECT 1)
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t1].[ID], [t1].[CreatedDate], [t1].[Discriminator], [t1].[FileName], [t1].[Path], [t1].[StorageType], [t1].[Showcase], [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [p0].[ProductsID]
    FROM [ProductProductImageFile] AS [p0]
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT [f].[ID], [f].[CreatedDate], [f].[Discriminator], [f].[FileName], [f].[Path], [f].[StorageType], [f].[Showcase]
        FROM [Files] AS [f]
        WHERE [f].[Discriminator] = N'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS [t1] ON [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID] = [t1].[ID]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[ID] = [t0].[ProductsID]
ORDER BY [t].[ID], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]

2023-12-10 17:56:29.603 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (0ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM [Products] AS [p]
2023-12-10 17:56:29.606 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (0ms) [Parameters=[@__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [t].[ID], [t].[Name], [t].[Price], [t].[Stock], [t].[CreatedDate], [t].[UpdatedDate], [t0].[ID], [t0].[CreatedDate], [t0].[Discriminator], [t0].[FileName], [t0].[Path], [t0].[StorageType], [t0].[Showcase], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]
FROM (
    SELECT [p].[ID], [p].[Name], [p].[Price], [p].[Stock], [p].[CreatedDate], [p].[UpdatedDate]
    FROM [Products] AS [p]
    ORDER BY (SELECT 1)
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t1].[ID], [t1].[CreatedDate], [t1].[Discriminator], [t1].[FileName], [t1].[Path], [t1].[StorageType], [t1].[Showcase], [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [p0].[ProductsID]
    FROM [ProductProductImageFile] AS [p0]
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT [f].[ID], [f].[CreatedDate], [f].[Discriminator], [f].[FileName], [f].[Path], [f].[StorageType], [f].[Showcase]
        FROM [Files] AS [f]
        WHERE [f].[Discriminator] = N'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS [t1] ON [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID] = [t1].[ID]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[ID] = [t0].[ProductsID]
ORDER BY [t].[ID], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]

2023-12-10 17:56:33.512 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (38ms) [Parameters=[@__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [t].[ID], [t].[Name], [t].[Price], [t].[Stock], [t].[CreatedDate], [t].[UpdatedDate], [t0].[ID], [t0].[CreatedDate], [t0].[Discriminator], [t0].[FileName], [t0].[Path], [t0].[StorageType], [t0].[Showcase], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]
FROM (
    SELECT [p].[ID], [p].[Name], [p].[Price], [p].[Stock], [p].[CreatedDate], [p].[UpdatedDate]
    FROM [Products] AS [p]
    ORDER BY (SELECT 1)
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t1].[ID], [t1].[CreatedDate], [t1].[Discriminator], [t1].[FileName], [t1].[Path], [t1].[StorageType], [t1].[Showcase], [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [p0].[ProductsID]
    FROM [ProductProductImageFile] AS [p0]
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT [f].[ID], [f].[CreatedDate], [f].[Discriminator], [f].[FileName], [f].[Path], [f].[StorageType], [f].[Showcase]
        FROM [Files] AS [f]
        WHERE [f].[Discriminator] = N'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS [t1] ON [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID] = [t1].[ID]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[ID] = [t0].[ProductsID]
ORDER BY [t].[ID], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]

2023-12-10 17:57:01.463 +03:00 [INF] Get All Products
2023-12-10 17:57:01.465 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (1ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM [Products] AS [p]
2023-12-10 17:57:01.475 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (8ms) [Parameters=[@__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [t].[ID], [t].[Name], [t].[Price], [t].[Stock], [t].[CreatedDate], [t].[UpdatedDate], [t0].[ID], [t0].[CreatedDate], [t0].[Discriminator], [t0].[FileName], [t0].[Path], [t0].[StorageType], [t0].[Showcase], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]
FROM (
    SELECT [p].[ID], [p].[Name], [p].[Price], [p].[Stock], [p].[CreatedDate], [p].[UpdatedDate]
    FROM [Products] AS [p]
    ORDER BY (SELECT 1)
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t1].[ID], [t1].[CreatedDate], [t1].[Discriminator], [t1].[FileName], [t1].[Path], [t1].[StorageType], [t1].[Showcase], [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [p0].[ProductsID]
    FROM [ProductProductImageFile] AS [p0]
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT [f].[ID], [f].[CreatedDate], [f].[Discriminator], [f].[FileName], [f].[Path], [f].[StorageType], [f].[Showcase]
        FROM [Files] AS [f]
        WHERE [f].[Discriminator] = N'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS [t1] ON [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID] = [t1].[ID]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[ID] = [t0].[ProductsID]
ORDER BY [t].[ID], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]

2023-12-10 17:57:24.859 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (0ms) [Parameters=[@__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [t].[ID], [t].[Name], [t].[Price], [t].[Stock], [t].[CreatedDate], [t].[UpdatedDate], [t0].[ID], [t0].[CreatedDate], [t0].[Discriminator], [t0].[FileName], [t0].[Path], [t0].[StorageType], [t0].[Showcase], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]
FROM (
    SELECT [p].[ID], [p].[Name], [p].[Price], [p].[Stock], [p].[CreatedDate], [p].[UpdatedDate]
    FROM [Products] AS [p]
    ORDER BY (SELECT 1)
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t1].[ID], [t1].[CreatedDate], [t1].[Discriminator], [t1].[FileName], [t1].[Path], [t1].[StorageType], [t1].[Showcase], [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [p0].[ProductsID]
    FROM [ProductProductImageFile] AS [p0]
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT [f].[ID], [f].[CreatedDate], [f].[Discriminator], [f].[FileName], [f].[Path], [f].[StorageType], [f].[Showcase]
        FROM [Files] AS [f]
        WHERE [f].[Discriminator] = N'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS [t1] ON [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID] = [t1].[ID]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[ID] = [t0].[ProductsID]
ORDER BY [t].[ID], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]

) AS [t]

2023-12-10 17:57:27.921 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (0ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM [Products] AS [p]
2023-12-10 17:57:27.923 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (0ms) [Parameters=[@__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [t].[ID], [t].[Name], [t].[Price], [t].[Stock], [t].[CreatedDate], [t].[UpdatedDate], [t0].[ID], [t0].[CreatedDate], [t0].[Discriminator], [t0].[FileName], [t0].[Path], [t0].[StorageType], [t0].[Showcase], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]
FROM (
    SELECT [p].[ID], [p].[Name], [p].[Price], [p].[Stock], [p].[CreatedDate], [p].[UpdatedDate]
    FROM [Products] AS [p]
    ORDER BY (SELECT 1)
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_0 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t1].[ID], [t1].[CreatedDate], [t1].[Discriminator], [t1].[FileName], [t1].[Path], [t1].[StorageType], [t1].[Showcase], [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [p0].[ProductsID]
    FROM [ProductProductImageFile] AS [p0]
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT [f].[ID], [f].[CreatedDate], [f].[Discriminator], [f].[FileName], [f].[Path], [f].[StorageType], [f].[Showcase]
        FROM [Files] AS [f]
        WHERE [f].[Discriminator] = N'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS [t1] ON [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID] = [t1].[ID]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[ID] = [t0].[ProductsID]
ORDER BY [t].[ID], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]

2023-12-10 17:57:57.624 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (2ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM [Products] AS [p]
2023-12-10 17:57:57.635 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (9ms) [Parameters=[@__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [t].[ID], [t].[Name], [t].[Price], [t].[Stock], [t].[CreatedDate], [t].[UpdatedDate], [t0].[ID], [t0].[CreatedDate], [t0].[Discriminator], [t0].[FileName], [t0].[Path], [t0].[StorageType], [t0].[Showcase], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]
FROM (
    SELECT [p].[ID], [p].[Name], [p].[Price], [p].[Stock], [p].[CreatedDate], [p].[UpdatedDate]
    FROM [Products] AS [p]
    ORDER BY (SELECT 1)
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t1].[ID], [t1].[CreatedDate], [t1].[Discriminator], [t1].[FileName], [t1].[Path], [t1].[StorageType], [t1].[Showcase], [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [p0].[ProductsID]
    FROM [ProductProductImageFile] AS [p0]
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT [f].[ID], [f].[CreatedDate], [f].[Discriminator], [f].[FileName], [f].[Path], [f].[StorageType], [f].[Showcase]
        FROM [Files] AS [f]
        WHERE [f].[Discriminator] = N'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS [t1] ON [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID] = [t1].[ID]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[ID] = [t0].[ProductsID]
ORDER BY [t].[ID], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]

2023-12-10 17:59:08.887 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (1ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM [Products] AS [p]
2023-12-10 17:59:08.898 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (9ms) [Parameters=[@__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [t].[ID], [t].[Name], [t].[Price], [t].[Stock], [t].[CreatedDate], [t].[UpdatedDate], [t0].[ID], [t0].[CreatedDate], [t0].[Discriminator], [t0].[FileName], [t0].[Path], [t0].[StorageType], [t0].[Showcase], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]
FROM (
    SELECT [p].[ID], [p].[Name], [p].[Price], [p].[Stock], [p].[CreatedDate], [p].[UpdatedDate]
    FROM [Products] AS [p]
    ORDER BY (SELECT 1)
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t1].[ID], [t1].[CreatedDate], [t1].[Discriminator], [t1].[FileName], [t1].[Path], [t1].[StorageType], [t1].[Showcase], [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [p0].[ProductsID]
    FROM [ProductProductImageFile] AS [p0]
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT [f].[ID], [f].[CreatedDate], [f].[Discriminator], [f].[FileName], [f].[Path], [f].[StorageType], [f].[Showcase]
        FROM [Files] AS [f]
        WHERE [f].[Discriminator] = N'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS [t1] ON [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID] = [t1].[ID]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[ID] = [t0].[ProductsID]
ORDER BY [t].[ID], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]

    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY

2023-12-10 17:59:23.091 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (0ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM [Products] AS [p]
2023-12-10 17:59:23.094 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (1ms) [Parameters=[@__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [t].[ID], [t].[Name], [t].[Price], [t].[Stock], [t].[CreatedDate], [t].[UpdatedDate], [t0].[ID], [t0].[CreatedDate], [t0].[Discriminator], [t0].[FileName], [t0].[Path], [t0].[StorageType], [t0].[Showcase], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]
FROM (
    SELECT [p].[ID], [p].[Name], [p].[Price], [p].[Stock], [p].[CreatedDate], [p].[UpdatedDate]
    FROM [Products] AS [p]
    ORDER BY (SELECT 1)
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t1].[ID], [t1].[CreatedDate], [t1].[Discriminator], [t1].[FileName], [t1].[Path], [t1].[StorageType], [t1].[Showcase], [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [p0].[ProductsID]
    FROM [ProductProductImageFile] AS [p0]
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT [f].[ID], [f].[CreatedDate], [f].[Discriminator], [f].[FileName], [f].[Path], [f].[StorageType], [f].[Showcase]
        FROM [Files] AS [f]
        WHERE [f].[Discriminator] = N'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS [t1] ON [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID] = [t1].[ID]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[ID] = [t0].[ProductsID]
ORDER BY [t].[ID], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]

FROM (
    SELECT [p].[ID], [p].[Name], [p].[Price], [p].[Stock], [p].[CreatedDate], [p].[UpdatedDate]
    FROM [Products] AS [p]
    ORDER BY (SELECT 1)
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t1].[ID], [t1].[CreatedDate], [t1].[Discriminator], [t1].[FileName], [t1].[Path], [t1].[StorageType], [t1].[Showcase], [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [p0].[ProductsID]

2023-12-10 17:59:33.876 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (0ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM [Products] AS [p]
2023-12-10 17:59:33.878 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (0ms) [Parameters=[@__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [t].[ID], [t].[Name], [t].[Price], [t].[Stock], [t].[CreatedDate], [t].[UpdatedDate], [t0].[ID], [t0].[CreatedDate], [t0].[Discriminator], [t0].[FileName], [t0].[Path], [t0].[StorageType], [t0].[Showcase], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]
FROM (
    SELECT [p].[ID], [p].[Name], [p].[Price], [p].[Stock], [p].[CreatedDate], [p].[UpdatedDate]
    FROM [Products] AS [p]
    ORDER BY (SELECT 1)
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t1].[ID], [t1].[CreatedDate], [t1].[Discriminator], [t1].[FileName], [t1].[Path], [t1].[StorageType], [t1].[Showcase], [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [p0].[ProductsID]
    FROM [ProductProductImageFile] AS [p0]
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT [f].[ID], [f].[CreatedDate], [f].[Discriminator], [f].[FileName], [f].[Path], [f].[StorageType], [f].[Showcase]
        FROM [Files] AS [f]
        WHERE [f].[Discriminator] = N'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS [t1] ON [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID] = [t1].[ID]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[ID] = [t0].[ProductsID]
ORDER BY [t].[ID], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]

2023-12-10 18:00:04.428 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (2ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM [Products] AS [p]
2023-12-10 18:00:04.446 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (15ms) [Parameters=[@__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [t].[ID], [t].[Name], [t].[Price], [t].[Stock], [t].[CreatedDate], [t].[UpdatedDate], [t0].[ID], [t0].[CreatedDate], [t0].[Discriminator], [t0].[FileName], [t0].[Path], [t0].[StorageType], [t0].[Showcase], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]
FROM (
    SELECT [p].[ID], [p].[Name], [p].[Price], [p].[Stock], [p].[CreatedDate], [p].[UpdatedDate]
    FROM [Products] AS [p]
    ORDER BY (SELECT 1)
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t1].[ID], [t1].[CreatedDate], [t1].[Discriminator], [t1].[FileName], [t1].[Path], [t1].[StorageType], [t1].[Showcase], [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [p0].[ProductsID]
    FROM [ProductProductImageFile] AS [p0]
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT [f].[ID], [f].[CreatedDate], [f].[Discriminator], [f].[FileName], [f].[Path], [f].[StorageType], [f].[Showcase]
        FROM [Files] AS [f]
        WHERE [f].[Discriminator] = N'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS [t1] ON [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID] = [t1].[ID]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[ID] = [t0].[ProductsID]
ORDER BY [t].[ID], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]

2023-12-10 18:02:04.723 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (13ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM [Products] AS [p]
2023-12-10 18:02:04.734 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (8ms) [Parameters=[@__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [t].[ID], [t].[Name], [t].[Price], [t].[Stock], [t].[CreatedDate], [t].[UpdatedDate], [t0].[ID], [t0].[CreatedDate], [t0].[Discriminator], [t0].[FileName], [t0].[Path], [t0].[StorageType], [t0].[Showcase], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]
FROM (
    SELECT [p].[ID], [p].[Name], [p].[Price], [p].[Stock], [p].[CreatedDate], [p].[UpdatedDate]
    FROM [Products] AS [p]
    ORDER BY (SELECT 1)
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t1].[ID], [t1].[CreatedDate], [t1].[Discriminator], [t1].[FileName], [t1].[Path], [t1].[StorageType], [t1].[Showcase], [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [p0].[ProductsID]
    FROM [ProductProductImageFile] AS [p0]
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT [f].[ID], [f].[CreatedDate], [f].[Discriminator], [f].[FileName], [f].[Path], [f].[StorageType], [f].[Showcase]
        FROM [Files] AS [f]
        WHERE [f].[Discriminator] = N'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS [t1] ON [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID] = [t1].[ID]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[ID] = [t0].[ProductsID]
ORDER BY [t].[ID], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]

FROM (
    SELECT [p].[ID], [p].[Name], [p].[Price], [p].[Stock], [p].[CreatedDate], [p].[UpdatedDate]
    FROM [Products] AS [p]
    ORDER BY (SELECT 1)
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t1].[ID], [t1].[CreatedDate], [t1].[Discriminator], [t1].[FileName], [t1].[Path], [t1].[StorageType], [t1].[Showcase], [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [p0].[ProductsID]

        SELECT [f].[ID], [f].[CreatedDate], [f].[Discriminator], [f].[FileName], [f].[Path], [f].[StorageType], [f].[Showcase]

) AS [t0] ON [t].[ID] = [t0].[ProductsID]

2023-12-10 18:02:52.153 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (0ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM [Products] AS [p]
2023-12-10 18:02:52.158 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (1ms) [Parameters=[@__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [t].[ID], [t].[Name], [t].[Price], [t].[Stock], [t].[CreatedDate], [t].[UpdatedDate], [t0].[ID], [t0].[CreatedDate], [t0].[Discriminator], [t0].[FileName], [t0].[Path], [t0].[StorageType], [t0].[Showcase], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]
FROM (
    SELECT [p].[ID], [p].[Name], [p].[Price], [p].[Stock], [p].[CreatedDate], [p].[UpdatedDate]
    FROM [Products] AS [p]
    ORDER BY (SELECT 1)
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t1].[ID], [t1].[CreatedDate], [t1].[Discriminator], [t1].[FileName], [t1].[Path], [t1].[StorageType], [t1].[Showcase], [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [p0].[ProductsID]
    FROM [ProductProductImageFile] AS [p0]
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT [f].[ID], [f].[CreatedDate], [f].[Discriminator], [f].[FileName], [f].[Path], [f].[StorageType], [f].[Showcase]
        FROM [Files] AS [f]
        WHERE [f].[Discriminator] = N'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS [t1] ON [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID] = [t1].[ID]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[ID] = [t0].[ProductsID]
ORDER BY [t].[ID], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]

SELECT COUNT(*)

2023-12-10 18:03:28.605 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (1ms) [Parameters=[@__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [t].[ID], [t].[Name], [t].[Price], [t].[Stock], [t].[CreatedDate], [t].[UpdatedDate], [t0].[ID], [t0].[CreatedDate], [t0].[Discriminator], [t0].[FileName], [t0].[Path], [t0].[StorageType], [t0].[Showcase], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]
FROM (
    SELECT [p].[ID], [p].[Name], [p].[Price], [p].[Stock], [p].[CreatedDate], [p].[UpdatedDate]
    FROM [Products] AS [p]
    ORDER BY (SELECT 1)
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t1].[ID], [t1].[CreatedDate], [t1].[Discriminator], [t1].[FileName], [t1].[Path], [t1].[StorageType], [t1].[Showcase], [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [p0].[ProductsID]
    FROM [ProductProductImageFile] AS [p0]
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT [f].[ID], [f].[CreatedDate], [f].[Discriminator], [f].[FileName], [f].[Path], [f].[StorageType], [f].[Showcase]
        FROM [Files] AS [f]
        WHERE [f].[Discriminator] = N'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS [t1] ON [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID] = [t1].[ID]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[ID] = [t0].[ProductsID]
ORDER BY [t].[ID], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]

2023-12-10 18:06:13.229 +03:00 [INF] Get All Products
2023-12-10 18:06:13.234 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (3ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM [Products] AS [p]
2023-12-10 18:06:13.253 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (17ms) [Parameters=[@__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [t].[ID], [t].[Name], [t].[Price], [t].[Stock], [t].[CreatedDate], [t].[UpdatedDate], [t0].[ID], [t0].[CreatedDate], [t0].[Discriminator], [t0].[FileName], [t0].[Path], [t0].[StorageType], [t0].[Showcase], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]
FROM (
    SELECT [p].[ID], [p].[Name], [p].[Price], [p].[Stock], [p].[CreatedDate], [p].[UpdatedDate]
    FROM [Products] AS [p]
    ORDER BY (SELECT 1)
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t1].[ID], [t1].[CreatedDate], [t1].[Discriminator], [t1].[FileName], [t1].[Path], [t1].[StorageType], [t1].[Showcase], [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [p0].[ProductsID]
    FROM [ProductProductImageFile] AS [p0]
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT [f].[ID], [f].[CreatedDate], [f].[Discriminator], [f].[FileName], [f].[Path], [f].[StorageType], [f].[Showcase]
        FROM [Files] AS [f]
        WHERE [f].[Discriminator] = N'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS [t1] ON [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID] = [t1].[ID]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[ID] = [t0].[ProductsID]
ORDER BY [t].[ID], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]

2023-12-10 18:06:47.151 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (10ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM [Products] AS [p]
2023-12-10 18:06:47.169 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (15ms) [Parameters=[@__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [t].[ID], [t].[Name], [t].[Price], [t].[Stock], [t].[CreatedDate], [t].[UpdatedDate], [t0].[ID], [t0].[CreatedDate], [t0].[Discriminator], [t0].[FileName], [t0].[Path], [t0].[StorageType], [t0].[Showcase], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]
FROM (
    SELECT [p].[ID], [p].[Name], [p].[Price], [p].[Stock], [p].[CreatedDate], [p].[UpdatedDate]
    FROM [Products] AS [p]
    ORDER BY (SELECT 1)
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t1].[ID], [t1].[CreatedDate], [t1].[Discriminator], [t1].[FileName], [t1].[Path], [t1].[StorageType], [t1].[Showcase], [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [p0].[ProductsID]
    FROM [ProductProductImageFile] AS [p0]
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT [f].[ID], [f].[CreatedDate], [f].[Discriminator], [f].[FileName], [f].[Path], [f].[StorageType], [f].[Showcase]
        FROM [Files] AS [f]
        WHERE [f].[Discriminator] = N'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS [t1] ON [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID] = [t1].[ID]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[ID] = [t0].[ProductsID]
ORDER BY [t].[ID], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]

2023-12-10 18:07:11.657 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (0ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM [Products] AS [p]
2023-12-10 18:07:11.661 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (0ms) [Parameters=[@__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [t].[ID], [t].[Name], [t].[Price], [t].[Stock], [t].[CreatedDate], [t].[UpdatedDate], [t0].[ID], [t0].[CreatedDate], [t0].[Discriminator], [t0].[FileName], [t0].[Path], [t0].[StorageType], [t0].[Showcase], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]
FROM (
    SELECT [p].[ID], [p].[Name], [p].[Price], [p].[Stock], [p].[CreatedDate], [p].[UpdatedDate]
    FROM [Products] AS [p]
    ORDER BY (SELECT 1)
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t1].[ID], [t1].[CreatedDate], [t1].[Discriminator], [t1].[FileName], [t1].[Path], [t1].[StorageType], [t1].[Showcase], [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [p0].[ProductsID]
    FROM [ProductProductImageFile] AS [p0]
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT [f].[ID], [f].[CreatedDate], [f].[Discriminator], [f].[FileName], [f].[Path], [f].[StorageType], [f].[Showcase]
        FROM [Files] AS [f]
        WHERE [f].[Discriminator] = N'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS [t1] ON [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID] = [t1].[ID]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[ID] = [t0].[ProductsID]
ORDER BY [t].[ID], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]

2023-12-10 18:08:17.600 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (2ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM [Products] AS [p]
2023-12-10 18:08:17.622 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (17ms) [Parameters=[@__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [t].[ID], [t].[Name], [t].[Price], [t].[Stock], [t].[CreatedDate], [t].[UpdatedDate], [t0].[ID], [t0].[CreatedDate], [t0].[Discriminator], [t0].[FileName], [t0].[Path], [t0].[StorageType], [t0].[Showcase], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]
FROM (
    SELECT [p].[ID], [p].[Name], [p].[Price], [p].[Stock], [p].[CreatedDate], [p].[UpdatedDate]
    FROM [Products] AS [p]
    ORDER BY (SELECT 1)
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t1].[ID], [t1].[CreatedDate], [t1].[Discriminator], [t1].[FileName], [t1].[Path], [t1].[StorageType], [t1].[Showcase], [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [p0].[ProductsID]
    FROM [ProductProductImageFile] AS [p0]
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT [f].[ID], [f].[CreatedDate], [f].[Discriminator], [f].[FileName], [f].[Path], [f].[StorageType], [f].[Showcase]
        FROM [Files] AS [f]
        WHERE [f].[Discriminator] = N'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS [t1] ON [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID] = [t1].[ID]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[ID] = [t0].[ProductsID]
ORDER BY [t].[ID], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]

2023-12-10 18:13:07.599 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (0ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM [Products] AS [p]
2023-12-10 18:13:07.606 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (1ms) [Parameters=[@__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [t].[ID], [t].[Name], [t].[Price], [t].[Stock], [t].[CreatedDate], [t].[UpdatedDate], [t0].[ID], [t0].[CreatedDate], [t0].[Discriminator], [t0].[FileName], [t0].[Path], [t0].[StorageType], [t0].[Showcase], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]
FROM (
    SELECT [p].[ID], [p].[Name], [p].[Price], [p].[Stock], [p].[CreatedDate], [p].[UpdatedDate]
    FROM [Products] AS [p]
    ORDER BY (SELECT 1)
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t1].[ID], [t1].[CreatedDate], [t1].[Discriminator], [t1].[FileName], [t1].[Path], [t1].[StorageType], [t1].[Showcase], [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [p0].[ProductsID]
    FROM [ProductProductImageFile] AS [p0]
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT [f].[ID], [f].[CreatedDate], [f].[Discriminator], [f].[FileName], [f].[Path], [f].[StorageType], [f].[Showcase]
        FROM [Files] AS [f]
        WHERE [f].[Discriminator] = N'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS [t1] ON [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID] = [t1].[ID]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[ID] = [t0].[ProductsID]
ORDER BY [t].[ID], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]

2023-12-10 18:14:40.354 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (1ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM [Products] AS [p]
2023-12-10 18:14:40.367 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (10ms) [Parameters=[@__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [t].[ID], [t].[Name], [t].[Price], [t].[Stock], [t].[CreatedDate], [t].[UpdatedDate], [t0].[ID], [t0].[CreatedDate], [t0].[Discriminator], [t0].[FileName], [t0].[Path], [t0].[StorageType], [t0].[Showcase], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]
FROM (
    SELECT [p].[ID], [p].[Name], [p].[Price], [p].[Stock], [p].[CreatedDate], [p].[UpdatedDate]
    FROM [Products] AS [p]
    ORDER BY (SELECT 1)
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t1].[ID], [t1].[CreatedDate], [t1].[Discriminator], [t1].[FileName], [t1].[Path], [t1].[StorageType], [t1].[Showcase], [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [p0].[ProductsID]
    FROM [ProductProductImageFile] AS [p0]
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT [f].[ID], [f].[CreatedDate], [f].[Discriminator], [f].[FileName], [f].[Path], [f].[StorageType], [f].[Showcase]
        FROM [Files] AS [f]
        WHERE [f].[Discriminator] = N'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS [t1] ON [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID] = [t1].[ID]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[ID] = [t0].[ProductsID]
ORDER BY [t].[ID], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]

2023-12-10 18:15:44.717 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (3ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM [Products] AS [p]
2023-12-10 18:15:44.736 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (16ms) [Parameters=[@__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [t].[ID], [t].[Name], [t].[Price], [t].[Stock], [t].[CreatedDate], [t].[UpdatedDate], [t0].[ID], [t0].[CreatedDate], [t0].[Discriminator], [t0].[FileName], [t0].[Path], [t0].[StorageType], [t0].[Showcase], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]
FROM (
    SELECT [p].[ID], [p].[Name], [p].[Price], [p].[Stock], [p].[CreatedDate], [p].[UpdatedDate]
    FROM [Products] AS [p]
    ORDER BY (SELECT 1)
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t1].[ID], [t1].[CreatedDate], [t1].[Discriminator], [t1].[FileName], [t1].[Path], [t1].[StorageType], [t1].[Showcase], [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [p0].[ProductsID]
    FROM [ProductProductImageFile] AS [p0]
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT [f].[ID], [f].[CreatedDate], [f].[Discriminator], [f].[FileName], [f].[Path], [f].[StorageType], [f].[Showcase]
        FROM [Files] AS [f]
        WHERE [f].[Discriminator] = N'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS [t1] ON [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID] = [t1].[ID]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[ID] = [t0].[ProductsID]
ORDER BY [t].[ID], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]

2023-12-10 18:15:56.820 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (0ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM [Products] AS [p]
2023-12-10 18:15:56.824 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (1ms) [Parameters=[@__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [t].[ID], [t].[Name], [t].[Price], [t].[Stock], [t].[CreatedDate], [t].[UpdatedDate], [t0].[ID], [t0].[CreatedDate], [t0].[Discriminator], [t0].[FileName], [t0].[Path], [t0].[StorageType], [t0].[Showcase], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]
FROM (
    SELECT [p].[ID], [p].[Name], [p].[Price], [p].[Stock], [p].[CreatedDate], [p].[UpdatedDate]
    FROM [Products] AS [p]
    ORDER BY (SELECT 1)
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t1].[ID], [t1].[CreatedDate], [t1].[Discriminator], [t1].[FileName], [t1].[Path], [t1].[StorageType], [t1].[Showcase], [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [p0].[ProductsID]
    FROM [ProductProductImageFile] AS [p0]
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT [f].[ID], [f].[CreatedDate], [f].[Discriminator], [f].[FileName], [f].[Path], [f].[StorageType], [f].[Showcase]
        FROM [Files] AS [f]
        WHERE [f].[Discriminator] = N'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS [t1] ON [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID] = [t1].[ID]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[ID] = [t0].[ProductsID]
ORDER BY [t].[ID], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]

2023-12-10 18:16:11.628 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (0ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM [Products] AS [p]
2023-12-10 18:16:11.632 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (0ms) [Parameters=[@__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [t].[ID], [t].[Name], [t].[Price], [t].[Stock], [t].[CreatedDate], [t].[UpdatedDate], [t0].[ID], [t0].[CreatedDate], [t0].[Discriminator], [t0].[FileName], [t0].[Path], [t0].[StorageType], [t0].[Showcase], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]
FROM (
    SELECT [p].[ID], [p].[Name], [p].[Price], [p].[Stock], [p].[CreatedDate], [p].[UpdatedDate]
    FROM [Products] AS [p]
    ORDER BY (SELECT 1)
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t1].[ID], [t1].[CreatedDate], [t1].[Discriminator], [t1].[FileName], [t1].[Path], [t1].[StorageType], [t1].[Showcase], [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [p0].[ProductsID]
    FROM [ProductProductImageFile] AS [p0]
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT [f].[ID], [f].[CreatedDate], [f].[Discriminator], [f].[FileName], [f].[Path], [f].[StorageType], [f].[Showcase]
        FROM [Files] AS [f]
        WHERE [f].[Discriminator] = N'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS [t1] ON [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID] = [t1].[ID]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[ID] = [t0].[ProductsID]
ORDER BY [t].[ID], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]

Executing controller action with signature System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1[Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.IActionResult] Get(ECommerceAPI.Application.Features.Queries.Product.GetAllProduct.GetAllProductQueryRequest) on controller ECommerceAPI.API.Controllers.ProductsController (ECommerceAPI.API).
2023-12-10 18:16:15.120 +03:00 [INF] Get All Products
2023-12-10 18:16:15.122 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (0ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM [Products] AS [p]
2023-12-10 18:16:15.124 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (0ms) [Parameters=[@__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [t].[ID], [t].[Name], [t].[Price], [t].[Stock], [t].[CreatedDate], [t].[UpdatedDate], [t0].[ID], [t0].[CreatedDate], [t0].[Discriminator], [t0].[FileName], [t0].[Path], [t0].[StorageType], [t0].[Showcase], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]
FROM (
    SELECT [p].[ID], [p].[Name], [p].[Price], [p].[Stock], [p].[CreatedDate], [p].[UpdatedDate]
    FROM [Products] AS [p]
    ORDER BY (SELECT 1)
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t1].[ID], [t1].[CreatedDate], [t1].[Discriminator], [t1].[FileName], [t1].[Path], [t1].[StorageType], [t1].[Showcase], [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [p0].[ProductsID]
    FROM [ProductProductImageFile] AS [p0]
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT [f].[ID], [f].[CreatedDate], [f].[Discriminator], [f].[FileName], [f].[Path], [f].[StorageType], [f].[Showcase]
        FROM [Files] AS [f]
        WHERE [f].[Discriminator] = N'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS [t1] ON [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID] = [t1].[ID]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[ID] = [t0].[ProductsID]
ORDER BY [t].[ID], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]

2023-12-10 18:26:20.557 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (2ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM [Products] AS [p]
2023-12-10 18:26:20.567 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (7ms) [Parameters=[@__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [t].[ID], [t].[Name], [t].[Price], [t].[Stock], [t].[CreatedDate], [t].[UpdatedDate], [t0].[ID], [t0].[CreatedDate], [t0].[Discriminator], [t0].[FileName], [t0].[Path], [t0].[StorageType], [t0].[Showcase], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]
FROM (
    SELECT [p].[ID], [p].[Name], [p].[Price], [p].[Stock], [p].[CreatedDate], [p].[UpdatedDate]
    FROM [Products] AS [p]
    ORDER BY (SELECT 1)
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t1].[ID], [t1].[CreatedDate], [t1].[Discriminator], [t1].[FileName], [t1].[Path], [t1].[StorageType], [t1].[Showcase], [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [p0].[ProductsID]
    FROM [ProductProductImageFile] AS [p0]
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT [f].[ID], [f].[CreatedDate], [f].[Discriminator], [f].[FileName], [f].[Path], [f].[StorageType], [f].[Showcase]
        FROM [Files] AS [f]
        WHERE [f].[Discriminator] = N'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS [t1] ON [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID] = [t1].[ID]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[ID] = [t0].[ProductsID]
ORDER BY [t].[ID], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]

2023-12-10 18:27:54.968 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (3ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM [Products] AS [p]
2023-12-10 18:27:54.984 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (12ms) [Parameters=[@__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [t].[ID], [t].[Name], [t].[Price], [t].[Stock], [t].[CreatedDate], [t].[UpdatedDate], [t0].[ID], [t0].[CreatedDate], [t0].[Discriminator], [t0].[FileName], [t0].[Path], [t0].[StorageType], [t0].[Showcase], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]
FROM (
    SELECT [p].[ID], [p].[Name], [p].[Price], [p].[Stock], [p].[CreatedDate], [p].[UpdatedDate]
    FROM [Products] AS [p]
    ORDER BY (SELECT 1)
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t1].[ID], [t1].[CreatedDate], [t1].[Discriminator], [t1].[FileName], [t1].[Path], [t1].[StorageType], [t1].[Showcase], [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [p0].[ProductsID]
    FROM [ProductProductImageFile] AS [p0]
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT [f].[ID], [f].[CreatedDate], [f].[Discriminator], [f].[FileName], [f].[Path], [f].[StorageType], [f].[Showcase]
        FROM [Files] AS [f]
        WHERE [f].[Discriminator] = N'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS [t1] ON [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID] = [t1].[ID]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[ID] = [t0].[ProductsID]
ORDER BY [t].[ID], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]

2023-12-10 18:28:35.321 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (3ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM [Products] AS [p]
2023-12-10 18:28:35.337 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (13ms) [Parameters=[@__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [t].[ID], [t].[Name], [t].[Price], [t].[Stock], [t].[CreatedDate], [t].[UpdatedDate], [t0].[ID], [t0].[CreatedDate], [t0].[Discriminator], [t0].[FileName], [t0].[Path], [t0].[StorageType], [t0].[Showcase], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]
FROM (
    SELECT [p].[ID], [p].[Name], [p].[Price], [p].[Stock], [p].[CreatedDate], [p].[UpdatedDate]
    FROM [Products] AS [p]
    ORDER BY (SELECT 1)
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t1].[ID], [t1].[CreatedDate], [t1].[Discriminator], [t1].[FileName], [t1].[Path], [t1].[StorageType], [t1].[Showcase], [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [p0].[ProductsID]
    FROM [ProductProductImageFile] AS [p0]
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT [f].[ID], [f].[CreatedDate], [f].[Discriminator], [f].[FileName], [f].[Path], [f].[StorageType], [f].[Showcase]
        FROM [Files] AS [f]
        WHERE [f].[Discriminator] = N'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS [t1] ON [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID] = [t1].[ID]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[ID] = [t0].[ProductsID]
ORDER BY [t].[ID], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]

SELECT [t].[ID], [t].[Name], [t].[Price], [t].[Stock], [t].[CreatedDate], [t].[UpdatedDate], [t0].[ID], [t0].[CreatedDate], [t0].[Discriminator], [t0].[FileName], [t0].[Path], [t0].[StorageType], [t0].[Showcase], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]
FROM (
    SELECT [p].[ID], [p].[Name], [p].[Price], [p].[Stock], [p].[CreatedDate], [p].[UpdatedDate]
    FROM [Products] AS [p]
    ORDER BY (SELECT 1)
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t1].[ID], [t1].[CreatedDate], [t1].[Discriminator], [t1].[FileName], [t1].[Path], [t1].[StorageType], [t1].[Showcase], [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [p0].[ProductsID]
    FROM [ProductProductImageFile] AS [p0]
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT [f].[ID], [f].[CreatedDate], [f].[Discriminator], [f].[FileName], [f].[Path], [f].[StorageType], [f].[Showcase]

        WHERE [f].[Discriminator] = N'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS [t1] ON [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID] = [t1].[ID]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[ID] = [t0].[ProductsID]
ORDER BY [t].[ID], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]

2023-12-10 18:38:57.398 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (12ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM [Products] AS [p]
2023-12-10 18:38:57.421 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (15ms) [Parameters=[@__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [t].[ID], [t].[Name], [t].[Price], [t].[Stock], [t].[CreatedDate], [t].[UpdatedDate], [t0].[ID], [t0].[CreatedDate], [t0].[Discriminator], [t0].[FileName], [t0].[Path], [t0].[StorageType], [t0].[Showcase], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]
FROM (
    SELECT [p].[ID], [p].[Name], [p].[Price], [p].[Stock], [p].[CreatedDate], [p].[UpdatedDate]
    FROM [Products] AS [p]
    ORDER BY (SELECT 1)
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t1].[ID], [t1].[CreatedDate], [t1].[Discriminator], [t1].[FileName], [t1].[Path], [t1].[StorageType], [t1].[Showcase], [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [p0].[ProductsID]
    FROM [ProductProductImageFile] AS [p0]
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT [f].[ID], [f].[CreatedDate], [f].[Discriminator], [f].[FileName], [f].[Path], [f].[StorageType], [f].[Showcase]
        FROM [Files] AS [f]
        WHERE [f].[Discriminator] = N'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS [t1] ON [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID] = [t1].[ID]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[ID] = [t0].[ProductsID]
ORDER BY [t].[ID], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]

SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM [Products] AS [p]
2023-12-10 18:39:05.861 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (0ms) [Parameters=[@__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [t].[ID], [t].[Name], [t].[Price], [t].[Stock], [t].[CreatedDate], [t].[UpdatedDate], [t0].[ID], [t0].[CreatedDate], [t0].[Discriminator], [t0].[FileName], [t0].[Path], [t0].[StorageType], [t0].[Showcase], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]
FROM (
    SELECT [p].[ID], [p].[Name], [p].[Price], [p].[Stock], [p].[CreatedDate], [p].[UpdatedDate]
    FROM [Products] AS [p]
    ORDER BY (SELECT 1)
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t1].[ID], [t1].[CreatedDate], [t1].[Discriminator], [t1].[FileName], [t1].[Path], [t1].[StorageType], [t1].[Showcase], [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [p0].[ProductsID]
    FROM [ProductProductImageFile] AS [p0]
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT [f].[ID], [f].[CreatedDate], [f].[Discriminator], [f].[FileName], [f].[Path], [f].[StorageType], [f].[Showcase]
        FROM [Files] AS [f]
        WHERE [f].[Discriminator] = N'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS [t1] ON [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID] = [t1].[ID]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[ID] = [t0].[ProductsID]
ORDER BY [t].[ID], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]

2023-12-10 19:01:39.944 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (55ms) [Parameters=[@__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [t].[ID], [t].[Name], [t].[Price], [t].[Stock], [t].[CreatedDate], [t].[UpdatedDate], [t0].[ID], [t0].[CreatedDate], [t0].[Discriminator], [t0].[FileName], [t0].[Path], [t0].[StorageType], [t0].[Showcase], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]
FROM (
    SELECT [p].[ID], [p].[Name], [p].[Price], [p].[Stock], [p].[CreatedDate], [p].[UpdatedDate]
    FROM [Products] AS [p]
    ORDER BY (SELECT 1)
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t1].[ID], [t1].[CreatedDate], [t1].[Discriminator], [t1].[FileName], [t1].[Path], [t1].[StorageType], [t1].[Showcase], [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [p0].[ProductsID]
    FROM [ProductProductImageFile] AS [p0]
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT [f].[ID], [f].[CreatedDate], [f].[Discriminator], [f].[FileName], [f].[Path], [f].[StorageType], [f].[Showcase]
        FROM [Files] AS [f]
        WHERE [f].[Discriminator] = N'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS [t1] ON [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID] = [t1].[ID]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[ID] = [t0].[ProductsID]
ORDER BY [t].[ID], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]

2023-12-10 19:01:47.127 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (0ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM [Products] AS [p]
2023-12-10 19:01:47.138 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (1ms) [Parameters=[@__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [t].[ID], [t].[Name], [t].[Price], [t].[Stock], [t].[CreatedDate], [t].[UpdatedDate], [t0].[ID], [t0].[CreatedDate], [t0].[Discriminator], [t0].[FileName], [t0].[Path], [t0].[StorageType], [t0].[Showcase], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]
FROM (
    SELECT [p].[ID], [p].[Name], [p].[Price], [p].[Stock], [p].[CreatedDate], [p].[UpdatedDate]
    FROM [Products] AS [p]
    ORDER BY (SELECT 1)
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t1].[ID], [t1].[CreatedDate], [t1].[Discriminator], [t1].[FileName], [t1].[Path], [t1].[StorageType], [t1].[Showcase], [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [p0].[ProductsID]
    FROM [ProductProductImageFile] AS [p0]
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT [f].[ID], [f].[CreatedDate], [f].[Discriminator], [f].[FileName], [f].[Path], [f].[StorageType], [f].[Showcase]
        FROM [Files] AS [f]
        WHERE [f].[Discriminator] = N'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS [t1] ON [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID] = [t1].[ID]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[ID] = [t0].[ProductsID]
ORDER BY [t].[ID], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]

2023-12-10 19:01:55.236 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (0ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM [Products] AS [p]
2023-12-10 19:01:55.242 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (2ms) [Parameters=[@__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [t].[ID], [t].[Name], [t].[Price], [t].[Stock], [t].[CreatedDate], [t].[UpdatedDate], [t0].[ID], [t0].[CreatedDate], [t0].[Discriminator], [t0].[FileName], [t0].[Path], [t0].[StorageType], [t0].[Showcase], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]
FROM (
    SELECT [p].[ID], [p].[Name], [p].[Price], [p].[Stock], [p].[CreatedDate], [p].[UpdatedDate]
    FROM [Products] AS [p]
    ORDER BY (SELECT 1)
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t1].[ID], [t1].[CreatedDate], [t1].[Discriminator], [t1].[FileName], [t1].[Path], [t1].[StorageType], [t1].[Showcase], [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [p0].[ProductsID]
    FROM [ProductProductImageFile] AS [p0]
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT [f].[ID], [f].[CreatedDate], [f].[Discriminator], [f].[FileName], [f].[Path], [f].[StorageType], [f].[Showcase]
        FROM [Files] AS [f]
        WHERE [f].[Discriminator] = N'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS [t1] ON [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID] = [t1].[ID]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[ID] = [t0].[ProductsID]
ORDER BY [t].[ID], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]

SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM [Products] AS [p]
2023-12-10 19:02:28.837 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (23ms) [Parameters=[@__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [t].[ID], [t].[Name], [t].[Price], [t].[Stock], [t].[CreatedDate], [t].[UpdatedDate], [t0].[ID], [t0].[CreatedDate], [t0].[Discriminator], [t0].[FileName], [t0].[Path], [t0].[StorageType], [t0].[Showcase], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]
FROM (
    SELECT [p].[ID], [p].[Name], [p].[Price], [p].[Stock], [p].[CreatedDate], [p].[UpdatedDate]
    FROM [Products] AS [p]
    ORDER BY (SELECT 1)
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t1].[ID], [t1].[CreatedDate], [t1].[Discriminator], [t1].[FileName], [t1].[Path], [t1].[StorageType], [t1].[Showcase], [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [p0].[ProductsID]
    FROM [ProductProductImageFile] AS [p0]
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT [f].[ID], [f].[CreatedDate], [f].[Discriminator], [f].[FileName], [f].[Path], [f].[StorageType], [f].[Showcase]
        FROM [Files] AS [f]
        WHERE [f].[Discriminator] = N'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS [t1] ON [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID] = [t1].[ID]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[ID] = [t0].[ProductsID]
ORDER BY [t].[ID], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]

2023-12-10 19:03:01.669 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (3ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM [Products] AS [p]
2023-12-10 19:03:01.686 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (12ms) [Parameters=[@__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [t].[ID], [t].[Name], [t].[Price], [t].[Stock], [t].[CreatedDate], [t].[UpdatedDate], [t0].[ID], [t0].[CreatedDate], [t0].[Discriminator], [t0].[FileName], [t0].[Path], [t0].[StorageType], [t0].[Showcase], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]
FROM (
    SELECT [p].[ID], [p].[Name], [p].[Price], [p].[Stock], [p].[CreatedDate], [p].[UpdatedDate]
    FROM [Products] AS [p]
    ORDER BY (SELECT 1)
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t1].[ID], [t1].[CreatedDate], [t1].[Discriminator], [t1].[FileName], [t1].[Path], [t1].[StorageType], [t1].[Showcase], [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [p0].[ProductsID]
    FROM [ProductProductImageFile] AS [p0]
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT [f].[ID], [f].[CreatedDate], [f].[Discriminator], [f].[FileName], [f].[Path], [f].[StorageType], [f].[Showcase]
        FROM [Files] AS [f]
        WHERE [f].[Discriminator] = N'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS [t1] ON [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID] = [t1].[ID]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[ID] = [t0].[ProductsID]
ORDER BY [t].[ID], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]

2023-12-10 19:04:26.126 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (7ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM [Products] AS [p]
2023-12-10 19:04:26.146 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (16ms) [Parameters=[@__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [t].[ID], [t].[Name], [t].[Price], [t].[Stock], [t].[CreatedDate], [t].[UpdatedDate], [t0].[ID], [t0].[CreatedDate], [t0].[Discriminator], [t0].[FileName], [t0].[Path], [t0].[StorageType], [t0].[Showcase], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]
FROM (
    SELECT [p].[ID], [p].[Name], [p].[Price], [p].[Stock], [p].[CreatedDate], [p].[UpdatedDate]
    FROM [Products] AS [p]
    ORDER BY (SELECT 1)
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t1].[ID], [t1].[CreatedDate], [t1].[Discriminator], [t1].[FileName], [t1].[Path], [t1].[StorageType], [t1].[Showcase], [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [p0].[ProductsID]
    FROM [ProductProductImageFile] AS [p0]
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT [f].[ID], [f].[CreatedDate], [f].[Discriminator], [f].[FileName], [f].[Path], [f].[StorageType], [f].[Showcase]
        FROM [Files] AS [f]
        WHERE [f].[Discriminator] = N'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS [t1] ON [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID] = [t1].[ID]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[ID] = [t0].[ProductsID]
ORDER BY [t].[ID], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]

2023-12-10 19:04:44.078 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (8ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM [Products] AS [p]
2023-12-10 19:04:44.090 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (9ms) [Parameters=[@__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [t].[ID], [t].[Name], [t].[Price], [t].[Stock], [t].[CreatedDate], [t].[UpdatedDate], [t0].[ID], [t0].[CreatedDate], [t0].[Discriminator], [t0].[FileName], [t0].[Path], [t0].[StorageType], [t0].[Showcase], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]
FROM (
    SELECT [p].[ID], [p].[Name], [p].[Price], [p].[Stock], [p].[CreatedDate], [p].[UpdatedDate]
    FROM [Products] AS [p]
    ORDER BY (SELECT 1)
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t1].[ID], [t1].[CreatedDate], [t1].[Discriminator], [t1].[FileName], [t1].[Path], [t1].[StorageType], [t1].[Showcase], [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [p0].[ProductsID]
    FROM [ProductProductImageFile] AS [p0]
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT [f].[ID], [f].[CreatedDate], [f].[Discriminator], [f].[FileName], [f].[Path], [f].[StorageType], [f].[Showcase]
        FROM [Files] AS [f]
        WHERE [f].[Discriminator] = N'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS [t1] ON [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID] = [t1].[ID]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[ID] = [t0].[ProductsID]
ORDER BY [t].[ID], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]

SELECT COUNT(*)

2023-12-10 19:05:16.511 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (0ms) [Parameters=[@__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [t].[ID], [t].[Name], [t].[Price], [t].[Stock], [t].[CreatedDate], [t].[UpdatedDate], [t0].[ID], [t0].[CreatedDate], [t0].[Discriminator], [t0].[FileName], [t0].[Path], [t0].[StorageType], [t0].[Showcase], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]
FROM (
    SELECT [p].[ID], [p].[Name], [p].[Price], [p].[Stock], [p].[CreatedDate], [p].[UpdatedDate]
    FROM [Products] AS [p]
    ORDER BY (SELECT 1)
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t1].[ID], [t1].[CreatedDate], [t1].[Discriminator], [t1].[FileName], [t1].[Path], [t1].[StorageType], [t1].[Showcase], [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [p0].[ProductsID]
    FROM [ProductProductImageFile] AS [p0]
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT [f].[ID], [f].[CreatedDate], [f].[Discriminator], [f].[FileName], [f].[Path], [f].[StorageType], [f].[Showcase]
        FROM [Files] AS [f]
        WHERE [f].[Discriminator] = N'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS [t1] ON [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID] = [t1].[ID]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[ID] = [t0].[ProductsID]
ORDER BY [t].[ID], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]

SELECT [t].[ID], [t].[Name], [t].[Price], [t].[Stock], [t].[CreatedDate], [t].[UpdatedDate], [t0].[ID], [t0].[CreatedDate], [t0].[Discriminator], [t0].[FileName], [t0].[Path], [t0].[StorageType], [t0].[Showcase], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]
FROM (
    SELECT [p].[ID], [p].[Name], [p].[Price], [p].[Stock], [p].[CreatedDate], [p].[UpdatedDate]
    FROM [Products] AS [p]
    ORDER BY (SELECT 1)
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t1].[ID], [t1].[CreatedDate], [t1].[Discriminator], [t1].[FileName], [t1].[Path], [t1].[StorageType], [t1].[Showcase], [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [p0].[ProductsID]
    FROM [ProductProductImageFile] AS [p0]
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT [f].[ID], [f].[CreatedDate], [f].[Discriminator], [f].[FileName], [f].[Path], [f].[StorageType], [f].[Showcase]
        FROM [Files] AS [f]
        WHERE [f].[Discriminator] = N'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS [t1] ON [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID] = [t1].[ID]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[ID] = [t0].[ProductsID]
ORDER BY [t].[ID], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]

2023-12-10 19:07:03.480 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (12ms) [Parameters=[@__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [t].[ID], [t].[Name], [t].[Price], [t].[Stock], [t].[CreatedDate], [t].[UpdatedDate], [t0].[ID], [t0].[CreatedDate], [t0].[Discriminator], [t0].[FileName], [t0].[Path], [t0].[StorageType], [t0].[Showcase], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]
FROM (
    SELECT [p].[ID], [p].[Name], [p].[Price], [p].[Stock], [p].[CreatedDate], [p].[UpdatedDate]
    FROM [Products] AS [p]
    ORDER BY (SELECT 1)
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t1].[ID], [t1].[CreatedDate], [t1].[Discriminator], [t1].[FileName], [t1].[Path], [t1].[StorageType], [t1].[Showcase], [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [p0].[ProductsID]
    FROM [ProductProductImageFile] AS [p0]
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT [f].[ID], [f].[CreatedDate], [f].[Discriminator], [f].[FileName], [f].[Path], [f].[StorageType], [f].[Showcase]
        FROM [Files] AS [f]
        WHERE [f].[Discriminator] = N'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS [t1] ON [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID] = [t1].[ID]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[ID] = [t0].[ProductsID]
ORDER BY [t].[ID], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]

2023-12-10 19:07:50.829 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (0ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM [Products] AS [p]
2023-12-10 19:07:50.833 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (1ms) [Parameters=[@__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [t].[ID], [t].[Name], [t].[Price], [t].[Stock], [t].[CreatedDate], [t].[UpdatedDate], [t0].[ID], [t0].[CreatedDate], [t0].[Discriminator], [t0].[FileName], [t0].[Path], [t0].[StorageType], [t0].[Showcase], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]
FROM (
    SELECT [p].[ID], [p].[Name], [p].[Price], [p].[Stock], [p].[CreatedDate], [p].[UpdatedDate]
    FROM [Products] AS [p]
    ORDER BY (SELECT 1)
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t1].[ID], [t1].[CreatedDate], [t1].[Discriminator], [t1].[FileName], [t1].[Path], [t1].[StorageType], [t1].[Showcase], [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [p0].[ProductsID]
    FROM [ProductProductImageFile] AS [p0]
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT [f].[ID], [f].[CreatedDate], [f].[Discriminator], [f].[FileName], [f].[Path], [f].[StorageType], [f].[Showcase]
        FROM [Files] AS [f]
        WHERE [f].[Discriminator] = N'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS [t1] ON [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID] = [t1].[ID]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[ID] = [t0].[ProductsID]
ORDER BY [t].[ID], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]

2023-12-10 19:08:02.040 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (2ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM [Products] AS [p]
2023-12-10 19:08:02.055 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (11ms) [Parameters=[@__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [t].[ID], [t].[Name], [t].[Price], [t].[Stock], [t].[CreatedDate], [t].[UpdatedDate], [t0].[ID], [t0].[CreatedDate], [t0].[Discriminator], [t0].[FileName], [t0].[Path], [t0].[StorageType], [t0].[Showcase], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]
FROM (
    SELECT [p].[ID], [p].[Name], [p].[Price], [p].[Stock], [p].[CreatedDate], [p].[UpdatedDate]
    FROM [Products] AS [p]
    ORDER BY (SELECT 1)
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t1].[ID], [t1].[CreatedDate], [t1].[Discriminator], [t1].[FileName], [t1].[Path], [t1].[StorageType], [t1].[Showcase], [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [p0].[ProductsID]
    FROM [ProductProductImageFile] AS [p0]
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT [f].[ID], [f].[CreatedDate], [f].[Discriminator], [f].[FileName], [f].[Path], [f].[StorageType], [f].[Showcase]
        FROM [Files] AS [f]
        WHERE [f].[Discriminator] = N'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS [t1] ON [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID] = [t1].[ID]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[ID] = [t0].[ProductsID]
ORDER BY [t].[ID], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]

SELECT COUNT(*)

2023-12-10 19:08:25.965 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (0ms) [Parameters=[@__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [t].[ID], [t].[Name], [t].[Price], [t].[Stock], [t].[CreatedDate], [t].[UpdatedDate], [t0].[ID], [t0].[CreatedDate], [t0].[Discriminator], [t0].[FileName], [t0].[Path], [t0].[StorageType], [t0].[Showcase], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]
FROM (
    SELECT [p].[ID], [p].[Name], [p].[Price], [p].[Stock], [p].[CreatedDate], [p].[UpdatedDate]
    FROM [Products] AS [p]
    ORDER BY (SELECT 1)
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t1].[ID], [t1].[CreatedDate], [t1].[Discriminator], [t1].[FileName], [t1].[Path], [t1].[StorageType], [t1].[Showcase], [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [p0].[ProductsID]
    FROM [ProductProductImageFile] AS [p0]
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT [f].[ID], [f].[CreatedDate], [f].[Discriminator], [f].[FileName], [f].[Path], [f].[StorageType], [f].[Showcase]
        FROM [Files] AS [f]
        WHERE [f].[Discriminator] = N'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS [t1] ON [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID] = [t1].[ID]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[ID] = [t0].[ProductsID]
ORDER BY [t].[ID], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]

SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM [Products] AS [p]
2023-12-10 19:08:44.461 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (0ms) [Parameters=[@__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [t].[ID], [t].[Name], [t].[Price], [t].[Stock], [t].[CreatedDate], [t].[UpdatedDate], [t0].[ID], [t0].[CreatedDate], [t0].[Discriminator], [t0].[FileName], [t0].[Path], [t0].[StorageType], [t0].[Showcase], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]
FROM (
    SELECT [p].[ID], [p].[Name], [p].[Price], [p].[Stock], [p].[CreatedDate], [p].[UpdatedDate]
    FROM [Products] AS [p]
    ORDER BY (SELECT 1)
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t1].[ID], [t1].[CreatedDate], [t1].[Discriminator], [t1].[FileName], [t1].[Path], [t1].[StorageType], [t1].[Showcase], [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [p0].[ProductsID]
    FROM [ProductProductImageFile] AS [p0]
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT [f].[ID], [f].[CreatedDate], [f].[Discriminator], [f].[FileName], [f].[Path], [f].[StorageType], [f].[Showcase]
        FROM [Files] AS [f]
        WHERE [f].[Discriminator] = N'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS [t1] ON [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID] = [t1].[ID]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[ID] = [t0].[ProductsID]
ORDER BY [t].[ID], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]

SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM [Products] AS [p]
2023-12-10 19:08:50.095 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (1ms) [Parameters=[@__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [t].[ID], [t].[Name], [t].[Price], [t].[Stock], [t].[CreatedDate], [t].[UpdatedDate], [t0].[ID], [t0].[CreatedDate], [t0].[Discriminator], [t0].[FileName], [t0].[Path], [t0].[StorageType], [t0].[Showcase], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]
FROM (
    SELECT [p].[ID], [p].[Name], [p].[Price], [p].[Stock], [p].[CreatedDate], [p].[UpdatedDate]
    FROM [Products] AS [p]
    ORDER BY (SELECT 1)
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t1].[ID], [t1].[CreatedDate], [t1].[Discriminator], [t1].[FileName], [t1].[Path], [t1].[StorageType], [t1].[Showcase], [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [p0].[ProductsID]
    FROM [ProductProductImageFile] AS [p0]
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT [f].[ID], [f].[CreatedDate], [f].[Discriminator], [f].[FileName], [f].[Path], [f].[StorageType], [f].[Showcase]
        FROM [Files] AS [f]
        WHERE [f].[Discriminator] = N'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS [t1] ON [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID] = [t1].[ID]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[ID] = [t0].[ProductsID]
ORDER BY [t].[ID], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]

2023-12-10 19:09:48.529 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (8ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM [Products] AS [p]
2023-12-10 19:09:48.550 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (17ms) [Parameters=[@__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [t].[ID], [t].[Name], [t].[Price], [t].[Stock], [t].[CreatedDate], [t].[UpdatedDate], [t0].[ID], [t0].[CreatedDate], [t0].[Discriminator], [t0].[FileName], [t0].[Path], [t0].[StorageType], [t0].[Showcase], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]
FROM (
    SELECT [p].[ID], [p].[Name], [p].[Price], [p].[Stock], [p].[CreatedDate], [p].[UpdatedDate]
    FROM [Products] AS [p]
    ORDER BY (SELECT 1)
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t1].[ID], [t1].[CreatedDate], [t1].[Discriminator], [t1].[FileName], [t1].[Path], [t1].[StorageType], [t1].[Showcase], [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [p0].[ProductsID]
    FROM [ProductProductImageFile] AS [p0]
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT [f].[ID], [f].[CreatedDate], [f].[Discriminator], [f].[FileName], [f].[Path], [f].[StorageType], [f].[Showcase]
        FROM [Files] AS [f]
        WHERE [f].[Discriminator] = N'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS [t1] ON [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID] = [t1].[ID]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[ID] = [t0].[ProductsID]
ORDER BY [t].[ID], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]

SELECT [t].[ID], [t].[Name], [t].[Price], [t].[Stock], [t].[CreatedDate], [t].[UpdatedDate], [t0].[ID], [t0].[CreatedDate], [t0].[Discriminator], [t0].[FileName], [t0].[Path], [t0].[StorageType], [t0].[Showcase], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]
FROM (
    SELECT [p].[ID], [p].[Name], [p].[Price], [p].[Stock], [p].[CreatedDate], [p].[UpdatedDate]
    FROM [Products] AS [p]
    ORDER BY (SELECT 1)
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t1].[ID], [t1].[CreatedDate], [t1].[Discriminator], [t1].[FileName], [t1].[Path], [t1].[StorageType], [t1].[Showcase], [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [p0].[ProductsID]
    FROM [ProductProductImageFile] AS [p0]
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT [f].[ID], [f].[CreatedDate], [f].[Discriminator], [f].[FileName], [f].[Path], [f].[StorageType], [f].[Showcase]
        FROM [Files] AS [f]
        WHERE [f].[Discriminator] = N'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS [t1] ON [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID] = [t1].[ID]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[ID] = [t0].[ProductsID]

2023-12-10 19:10:57.612 +03:00 [INF] Get All Products
2023-12-10 19:10:57.613 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (0ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM [Products] AS [p]
2023-12-10 19:10:57.617 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (1ms) [Parameters=[@__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [t].[ID], [t].[Name], [t].[Price], [t].[Stock], [t].[CreatedDate], [t].[UpdatedDate], [t0].[ID], [t0].[CreatedDate], [t0].[Discriminator], [t0].[FileName], [t0].[Path], [t0].[StorageType], [t0].[Showcase], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]
FROM (
    SELECT [p].[ID], [p].[Name], [p].[Price], [p].[Stock], [p].[CreatedDate], [p].[UpdatedDate]
    FROM [Products] AS [p]
    ORDER BY (SELECT 1)
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t1].[ID], [t1].[CreatedDate], [t1].[Discriminator], [t1].[FileName], [t1].[Path], [t1].[StorageType], [t1].[Showcase], [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [p0].[ProductsID]
    FROM [ProductProductImageFile] AS [p0]
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT [f].[ID], [f].[CreatedDate], [f].[Discriminator], [f].[FileName], [f].[Path], [f].[StorageType], [f].[Showcase]
        FROM [Files] AS [f]
        WHERE [f].[Discriminator] = N'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS [t1] ON [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID] = [t1].[ID]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[ID] = [t0].[ProductsID]
ORDER BY [t].[ID], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]

SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM [Products] AS [p]
2023-12-10 19:11:22.136 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (11ms) [Parameters=[@__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [t].[ID], [t].[Name], [t].[Price], [t].[Stock], [t].[CreatedDate], [t].[UpdatedDate], [t0].[ID], [t0].[CreatedDate], [t0].[Discriminator], [t0].[FileName], [t0].[Path], [t0].[StorageType], [t0].[Showcase], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]
FROM (
    SELECT [p].[ID], [p].[Name], [p].[Price], [p].[Stock], [p].[CreatedDate], [p].[UpdatedDate]
    FROM [Products] AS [p]
    ORDER BY (SELECT 1)
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t1].[ID], [t1].[CreatedDate], [t1].[Discriminator], [t1].[FileName], [t1].[Path], [t1].[StorageType], [t1].[Showcase], [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [p0].[ProductsID]
    FROM [ProductProductImageFile] AS [p0]
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT [f].[ID], [f].[CreatedDate], [f].[Discriminator], [f].[FileName], [f].[Path], [f].[StorageType], [f].[Showcase]
        FROM [Files] AS [f]
        WHERE [f].[Discriminator] = N'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS [t1] ON [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID] = [t1].[ID]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[ID] = [t0].[ProductsID]
ORDER BY [t].[ID], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]
