SELECT [t].[ID], [t].[Name], [t].[Price], [t].[Stock], [t].[CreatedDate], [t].[UpdatedDate], [t0].[ID], [t0].[CreatedDate], [t0].[Discriminator], [t0].[FileName], [t0].[Path], [t0].[StorageType], [t0].[Showcase], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]
FROM (
    SELECT [p].[ID], [p].[Name], [p].[Price], [p].[Stock], [p].[CreatedDate], [p].[UpdatedDate]
    FROM [Products] AS [p]
    ORDER BY (SELECT 1)
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t1].[ID], [t1].[CreatedDate], [t1].[Discriminator], [t1].[FileName], [t1].[Path], [t1].[StorageType], [t1].[Showcase], [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [p0].[ProductsID]
    FROM [ProductProductImageFile] AS [p0]
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT [f].[ID], [f].[CreatedDate], [f].[Discriminator], [f].[FileName], [f].[Path], [f].[StorageType], [f].[Showcase]
        FROM [Files] AS [f]
        WHERE [f].[Discriminator] = N'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS [t1] ON [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID] = [t1].[ID]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[ID] = [t0].[ProductsID]
ORDER BY [t].[ID], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]

SELECT [t].[ID], [t].[Name], [t].[Price], [t].[Stock], [t].[CreatedDate], [t].[UpdatedDate], [t0].[ID], [t0].[CreatedDate], [t0].[Discriminator], [t0].[FileName], [t0].[Path], [t0].[StorageType], [t0].[Showcase], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]
FROM (
    SELECT [p].[ID], [p].[Name], [p].[Price], [p].[Stock], [p].[CreatedDate], [p].[UpdatedDate]
    FROM [Products] AS [p]
    ORDER BY (SELECT 1)
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t1].[ID], [t1].[CreatedDate], [t1].[Discriminator], [t1].[FileName], [t1].[Path], [t1].[StorageType], [t1].[Showcase], [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [p0].[ProductsID]
    FROM [ProductProductImageFile] AS [p0]
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT [f].[ID], [f].[CreatedDate], [f].[Discriminator], [f].[FileName], [f].[Path], [f].[StorageType], [f].[Showcase]
        FROM [Files] AS [f]
        WHERE [f].[Discriminator] = N'ProductImageFile'

) AS [t0] ON [t].[ID] = [t0].[ProductsID]

2023-12-10 19:13:15.976 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (3ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM [Products] AS [p]
2023-12-10 19:13:15.996 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (16ms) [Parameters=[@__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [t].[ID], [t].[Name], [t].[Price], [t].[Stock], [t].[CreatedDate], [t].[UpdatedDate], [t0].[ID], [t0].[CreatedDate], [t0].[Discriminator], [t0].[FileName], [t0].[Path], [t0].[StorageType], [t0].[Showcase], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]
FROM (
    SELECT [p].[ID], [p].[Name], [p].[Price], [p].[Stock], [p].[CreatedDate], [p].[UpdatedDate]
    FROM [Products] AS [p]
    ORDER BY (SELECT 1)
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t1].[ID], [t1].[CreatedDate], [t1].[Discriminator], [t1].[FileName], [t1].[Path], [t1].[StorageType], [t1].[Showcase], [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [p0].[ProductsID]
    FROM [ProductProductImageFile] AS [p0]
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT [f].[ID], [f].[CreatedDate], [f].[Discriminator], [f].[FileName], [f].[Path], [f].[StorageType], [f].[Showcase]
        FROM [Files] AS [f]
        WHERE [f].[Discriminator] = N'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS [t1] ON [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID] = [t1].[ID]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[ID] = [t0].[ProductsID]
ORDER BY [t].[ID], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]

SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM [Products] AS [p]
2023-12-10 19:13:37.548 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (11ms) [Parameters=[@__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [t].[ID], [t].[Name], [t].[Price], [t].[Stock], [t].[CreatedDate], [t].[UpdatedDate], [t0].[ID], [t0].[CreatedDate], [t0].[Discriminator], [t0].[FileName], [t0].[Path], [t0].[StorageType], [t0].[Showcase], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]
FROM (
    SELECT [p].[ID], [p].[Name], [p].[Price], [p].[Stock], [p].[CreatedDate], [p].[UpdatedDate]
    FROM [Products] AS [p]
    ORDER BY (SELECT 1)
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t1].[ID], [t1].[CreatedDate], [t1].[Discriminator], [t1].[FileName], [t1].[Path], [t1].[StorageType], [t1].[Showcase], [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [p0].[ProductsID]
    FROM [ProductProductImageFile] AS [p0]
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT [f].[ID], [f].[CreatedDate], [f].[Discriminator], [f].[FileName], [f].[Path], [f].[StorageType], [f].[Showcase]
        FROM [Files] AS [f]
        WHERE [f].[Discriminator] = N'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS [t1] ON [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID] = [t1].[ID]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[ID] = [t0].[ProductsID]
ORDER BY [t].[ID], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]

SELECT [t].[ID], [t].[Name], [t].[Price], [t].[Stock], [t].[CreatedDate], [t].[UpdatedDate], [t0].[ID], [t0].[CreatedDate], [t0].[Discriminator], [t0].[FileName], [t0].[Path], [t0].[StorageType], [t0].[Showcase], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]
FROM (
    SELECT [p].[ID], [p].[Name], [p].[Price], [p].[Stock], [p].[CreatedDate], [p].[UpdatedDate]
    FROM [Products] AS [p]
    ORDER BY (SELECT 1)
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t1].[ID], [t1].[CreatedDate], [t1].[Discriminator], [t1].[FileName], [t1].[Path], [t1].[StorageType], [t1].[Showcase], [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [p0].[ProductsID]
    FROM [ProductProductImageFile] AS [p0]

        FROM [Files] AS [f]
        WHERE [f].[Discriminator] = N'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS [t1] ON [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID] = [t1].[ID]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[ID] = [t0].[ProductsID]
ORDER BY [t].[ID], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]

2023-12-10 19:15:15.569 +03:00 [INF] Route matched with {action = "Get", controller = "Products"}. Executing controller action with signature System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1[Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.IActionResult] Get(ECommerceAPI.Application.Features.Queries.Product.GetAllProduct.GetAllProductQueryRequest) on controller ECommerceAPI.API.Controllers.ProductsController (ECommerceAPI.API).
2023-12-10 19:15:15.571 +03:00 [INF] Get All Products
2023-12-10 19:15:15.574 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (1ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM [Products] AS [p]
2023-12-10 19:15:15.587 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (11ms) [Parameters=[@__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [t].[ID], [t].[Name], [t].[Price], [t].[Stock], [t].[CreatedDate], [t].[UpdatedDate], [t0].[ID], [t0].[CreatedDate], [t0].[Discriminator], [t0].[FileName], [t0].[Path], [t0].[StorageType], [t0].[Showcase], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]
FROM (
    SELECT [p].[ID], [p].[Name], [p].[Price], [p].[Stock], [p].[CreatedDate], [p].[UpdatedDate]
    FROM [Products] AS [p]
    ORDER BY (SELECT 1)
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t1].[ID], [t1].[CreatedDate], [t1].[Discriminator], [t1].[FileName], [t1].[Path], [t1].[StorageType], [t1].[Showcase], [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [p0].[ProductsID]
    FROM [ProductProductImageFile] AS [p0]
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT [f].[ID], [f].[CreatedDate], [f].[Discriminator], [f].[FileName], [f].[Path], [f].[StorageType], [f].[Showcase]
        FROM [Files] AS [f]
        WHERE [f].[Discriminator] = N'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS [t1] ON [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID] = [t1].[ID]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[ID] = [t0].[ProductsID]
ORDER BY [t].[ID], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]

2023-12-10 19:15:32.688 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (0ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM [Products] AS [p]
2023-12-10 19:15:32.692 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (1ms) [Parameters=[@__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [t].[ID], [t].[Name], [t].[Price], [t].[Stock], [t].[CreatedDate], [t].[UpdatedDate], [t0].[ID], [t0].[CreatedDate], [t0].[Discriminator], [t0].[FileName], [t0].[Path], [t0].[StorageType], [t0].[Showcase], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]
FROM (
    SELECT [p].[ID], [p].[Name], [p].[Price], [p].[Stock], [p].[CreatedDate], [p].[UpdatedDate]
    FROM [Products] AS [p]
    ORDER BY (SELECT 1)
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t1].[ID], [t1].[CreatedDate], [t1].[Discriminator], [t1].[FileName], [t1].[Path], [t1].[StorageType], [t1].[Showcase], [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [p0].[ProductsID]
    FROM [ProductProductImageFile] AS [p0]
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT [f].[ID], [f].[CreatedDate], [f].[Discriminator], [f].[FileName], [f].[Path], [f].[StorageType], [f].[Showcase]
        FROM [Files] AS [f]
        WHERE [f].[Discriminator] = N'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS [t1] ON [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID] = [t1].[ID]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[ID] = [t0].[ProductsID]
ORDER BY [t].[ID], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]

2023-12-10 19:17:31.857 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (2ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM [Products] AS [p]
2023-12-10 19:17:31.870 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (10ms) [Parameters=[@__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [t].[ID], [t].[Name], [t].[Price], [t].[Stock], [t].[CreatedDate], [t].[UpdatedDate], [t0].[ID], [t0].[CreatedDate], [t0].[Discriminator], [t0].[FileName], [t0].[Path], [t0].[StorageType], [t0].[Showcase], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]
FROM (
    SELECT [p].[ID], [p].[Name], [p].[Price], [p].[Stock], [p].[CreatedDate], [p].[UpdatedDate]
    FROM [Products] AS [p]
    ORDER BY (SELECT 1)
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t1].[ID], [t1].[CreatedDate], [t1].[Discriminator], [t1].[FileName], [t1].[Path], [t1].[StorageType], [t1].[Showcase], [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [p0].[ProductsID]
    FROM [ProductProductImageFile] AS [p0]
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT [f].[ID], [f].[CreatedDate], [f].[Discriminator], [f].[FileName], [f].[Path], [f].[StorageType], [f].[Showcase]
        FROM [Files] AS [f]
        WHERE [f].[Discriminator] = N'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS [t1] ON [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID] = [t1].[ID]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[ID] = [t0].[ProductsID]
ORDER BY [t].[ID], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]

SELECT [t].[CreatedDate], [t].[OrderCode], (
    SELECT CAST(COALESCE(SUM([p].[Price] * CAST([b0].[Quantity] AS real)), 0.0E0) AS real)
    FROM [BasketsItems] AS [b0]
    INNER JOIN [Products] AS [p] ON [b0].[ProductId] = [p].[ID]
    WHERE [b].[ID] = [b0].[BasketId]) AS [TotalPrice], [a].[UserName]

    FROM [Orders] AS [o]
    ORDER BY (SELECT 1)
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]

2023-12-15 14:43:16.401 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (0ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM [Products] AS [p]
2023-12-15 14:43:16.404 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (0ms) [Parameters=[@__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [t].[ID], [t].[Name], [t].[Price], [t].[Stock], [t].[CreatedDate], [t].[UpdatedDate], [t0].[ID], [t0].[CreatedDate], [t0].[Discriminator], [t0].[FileName], [t0].[Path], [t0].[StorageType], [t0].[Showcase], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]
FROM (
    SELECT [p].[ID], [p].[Name], [p].[Price], [p].[Stock], [p].[CreatedDate], [p].[UpdatedDate]
    FROM [Products] AS [p]
    ORDER BY (SELECT 1)
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t1].[ID], [t1].[CreatedDate], [t1].[Discriminator], [t1].[FileName], [t1].[Path], [t1].[StorageType], [t1].[Showcase], [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [p0].[ProductsID]
    FROM [ProductProductImageFile] AS [p0]
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT [f].[ID], [f].[CreatedDate], [f].[Discriminator], [f].[FileName], [f].[Path], [f].[StorageType], [f].[Showcase]
        FROM [Files] AS [f]
        WHERE [f].[Discriminator] = N'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS [t1] ON [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID] = [t1].[ID]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[ID] = [t0].[ProductsID]
ORDER BY [t].[ID], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]

2023-12-15 14:43:51.218 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (3ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM [Products] AS [p]
2023-12-15 14:43:51.232 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (11ms) [Parameters=[@__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [t].[ID], [t].[Name], [t].[Price], [t].[Stock], [t].[CreatedDate], [t].[UpdatedDate], [t0].[ID], [t0].[CreatedDate], [t0].[Discriminator], [t0].[FileName], [t0].[Path], [t0].[StorageType], [t0].[Showcase], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]
FROM (
    SELECT [p].[ID], [p].[Name], [p].[Price], [p].[Stock], [p].[CreatedDate], [p].[UpdatedDate]
    FROM [Products] AS [p]
    ORDER BY (SELECT 1)
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t1].[ID], [t1].[CreatedDate], [t1].[Discriminator], [t1].[FileName], [t1].[Path], [t1].[StorageType], [t1].[Showcase], [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [p0].[ProductsID]
    FROM [ProductProductImageFile] AS [p0]
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT [f].[ID], [f].[CreatedDate], [f].[Discriminator], [f].[FileName], [f].[Path], [f].[StorageType], [f].[Showcase]
        FROM [Files] AS [f]
        WHERE [f].[Discriminator] = N'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS [t1] ON [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID] = [t1].[ID]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[ID] = [t0].[ProductsID]
ORDER BY [t].[ID], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]

2023-12-15 14:45:54.456 +03:00 [INF] Get All Products
2023-12-15 14:45:54.459 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (2ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM [Products] AS [p]
2023-12-15 14:45:54.493 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (16ms) [Parameters=[@__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [t].[ID], [t].[Name], [t].[Price], [t].[Stock], [t].[CreatedDate], [t].[UpdatedDate], [t0].[ID], [t0].[CreatedDate], [t0].[Discriminator], [t0].[FileName], [t0].[Path], [t0].[StorageType], [t0].[Showcase], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]
FROM (
    SELECT [p].[ID], [p].[Name], [p].[Price], [p].[Stock], [p].[CreatedDate], [p].[UpdatedDate]
    FROM [Products] AS [p]
    ORDER BY (SELECT 1)
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t1].[ID], [t1].[CreatedDate], [t1].[Discriminator], [t1].[FileName], [t1].[Path], [t1].[StorageType], [t1].[Showcase], [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [p0].[ProductsID]
    FROM [ProductProductImageFile] AS [p0]
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT [f].[ID], [f].[CreatedDate], [f].[Discriminator], [f].[FileName], [f].[Path], [f].[StorageType], [f].[Showcase]
        FROM [Files] AS [f]
        WHERE [f].[Discriminator] = N'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS [t1] ON [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID] = [t1].[ID]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[ID] = [t0].[ProductsID]
ORDER BY [t].[ID], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]

2023-12-15 14:46:24.860 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (1ms) [Parameters=[@__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [t].[ID], [t].[Name], [t].[Price], [t].[Stock], [t].[CreatedDate], [t].[UpdatedDate], [t0].[ID], [t0].[CreatedDate], [t0].[Discriminator], [t0].[FileName], [t0].[Path], [t0].[StorageType], [t0].[Showcase], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]
FROM (
    SELECT [p].[ID], [p].[Name], [p].[Price], [p].[Stock], [p].[CreatedDate], [p].[UpdatedDate]
    FROM [Products] AS [p]
    ORDER BY (SELECT 1)
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t1].[ID], [t1].[CreatedDate], [t1].[Discriminator], [t1].[FileName], [t1].[Path], [t1].[StorageType], [t1].[Showcase], [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [p0].[ProductsID]
    FROM [ProductProductImageFile] AS [p0]
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT [f].[ID], [f].[CreatedDate], [f].[Discriminator], [f].[FileName], [f].[Path], [f].[StorageType], [f].[Showcase]
        FROM [Files] AS [f]
        WHERE [f].[Discriminator] = N'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS [t1] ON [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID] = [t1].[ID]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[ID] = [t0].[ProductsID]
ORDER BY [t].[ID], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]

2023-12-15 14:46:46.640 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (9ms) [Parameters=[@__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [t].[ID], [t].[Name], [t].[Price], [t].[Stock], [t].[CreatedDate], [t].[UpdatedDate], [t0].[ID], [t0].[CreatedDate], [t0].[Discriminator], [t0].[FileName], [t0].[Path], [t0].[StorageType], [t0].[Showcase], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]
FROM (
    SELECT [p].[ID], [p].[Name], [p].[Price], [p].[Stock], [p].[CreatedDate], [p].[UpdatedDate]
    FROM [Products] AS [p]
    ORDER BY (SELECT 1)
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t1].[ID], [t1].[CreatedDate], [t1].[Discriminator], [t1].[FileName], [t1].[Path], [t1].[StorageType], [t1].[Showcase], [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [p0].[ProductsID]
    FROM [ProductProductImageFile] AS [p0]
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT [f].[ID], [f].[CreatedDate], [f].[Discriminator], [f].[FileName], [f].[Path], [f].[StorageType], [f].[Showcase]
        FROM [Files] AS [f]
        WHERE [f].[Discriminator] = N'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS [t1] ON [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID] = [t1].[ID]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[ID] = [t0].[ProductsID]
ORDER BY [t].[ID], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]

Executing controller action with signature System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1[Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.IActionResult] GetAllOrders(ECommerceAPI.Application.Features.Queries.Order.GetAllOrders.GetAllOrdersQueryRequest) on controller ECommerceAPI.API.Controllers.OrdersController (ECommerceAPI.API).
2023-12-15 14:46:48.222 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (3ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM [Orders] AS [o]
2023-12-15 14:46:48.238 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (11ms) [Parameters=[@__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [t].[CreatedDate], [t].[OrderCode], (
    SELECT CAST(COALESCE(SUM([p].[Price] * CAST([b0].[Quantity] AS real)), 0.0E0) AS real)
    FROM [BasketsItems] AS [b0]
    INNER JOIN [Products] AS [p] ON [b0].[ProductId] = [p].[ID]
    WHERE [b].[ID] = [b0].[BasketId]) AS [TotalPrice], [a].[UserName]
FROM (
    SELECT [o].[ID], [o].[CreatedDate], [o].[OrderCode]
    FROM [Orders] AS [o]
    ORDER BY (SELECT 1)
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
INNER JOIN [Baskets] AS [b] ON [t].[ID] = [b].[ID]
INNER JOIN [AspNetUsers] AS [a] ON [b].[UserId] = [a].[Id]

FROM (
    SELECT [p].[ID], [p].[Name], [p].[Price], [p].[Stock], [p].[CreatedDate], [p].[UpdatedDate]
    FROM [Products] AS [p]
    ORDER BY (SELECT 1)
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t1].[ID], [t1].[CreatedDate], [t1].[Discriminator], [t1].[FileName], [t1].[Path], [t1].[StorageType], [t1].[Showcase], [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [p0].[ProductsID]
    FROM [ProductProductImageFile] AS [p0]
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT [f].[ID], [f].[CreatedDate], [f].[Discriminator], [f].[FileName], [f].[Path], [f].[StorageType], [f].[Showcase]
        FROM [Files] AS [f]
        WHERE [f].[Discriminator] = N'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS [t1] ON [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID] = [t1].[ID]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[ID] = [t0].[ProductsID]
ORDER BY [t].[ID], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]

2023-12-15 14:46:52.328 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (0ms) [Parameters=[@__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [t].[ID], [t].[Name], [t].[Price], [t].[Stock], [t].[CreatedDate], [t].[UpdatedDate], [t0].[ID], [t0].[CreatedDate], [t0].[Discriminator], [t0].[FileName], [t0].[Path], [t0].[StorageType], [t0].[Showcase], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]
FROM (
    SELECT [p].[ID], [p].[Name], [p].[Price], [p].[Stock], [p].[CreatedDate], [p].[UpdatedDate]
    FROM [Products] AS [p]
    ORDER BY (SELECT 1)
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t1].[ID], [t1].[CreatedDate], [t1].[Discriminator], [t1].[FileName], [t1].[Path], [t1].[StorageType], [t1].[Showcase], [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [p0].[ProductsID]
    FROM [ProductProductImageFile] AS [p0]
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT [f].[ID], [f].[CreatedDate], [f].[Discriminator], [f].[FileName], [f].[Path], [f].[StorageType], [f].[Showcase]
        FROM [Files] AS [f]
        WHERE [f].[Discriminator] = N'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS [t1] ON [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID] = [t1].[ID]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[ID] = [t0].[ProductsID]
ORDER BY [t].[ID], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]

2023-12-15 14:46:58.828 +03:00 [INF] Get All Products
2023-12-15 14:46:58.829 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (0ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM [Products] AS [p]
2023-12-15 14:46:58.832 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (0ms) [Parameters=[@__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [t].[ID], [t].[Name], [t].[Price], [t].[Stock], [t].[CreatedDate], [t].[UpdatedDate], [t0].[ID], [t0].[CreatedDate], [t0].[Discriminator], [t0].[FileName], [t0].[Path], [t0].[StorageType], [t0].[Showcase], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]
FROM (
    SELECT [p].[ID], [p].[Name], [p].[Price], [p].[Stock], [p].[CreatedDate], [p].[UpdatedDate]
    FROM [Products] AS [p]
    ORDER BY (SELECT 1)
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t1].[ID], [t1].[CreatedDate], [t1].[Discriminator], [t1].[FileName], [t1].[Path], [t1].[StorageType], [t1].[Showcase], [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [p0].[ProductsID]
    FROM [ProductProductImageFile] AS [p0]
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT [f].[ID], [f].[CreatedDate], [f].[Discriminator], [f].[FileName], [f].[Path], [f].[StorageType], [f].[Showcase]
        FROM [Files] AS [f]
        WHERE [f].[Discriminator] = N'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS [t1] ON [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID] = [t1].[ID]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[ID] = [t0].[ProductsID]
ORDER BY [t].[ID], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]

Executing controller action with signature System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1[Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.IActionResult] Get(ECommerceAPI.Application.Features.Queries.Product.GetAllProduct.GetAllProductQueryRequest) on controller ECommerceAPI.API.Controllers.ProductsController (ECommerceAPI.API).
2023-12-15 14:48:19.712 +03:00 [INF] Get All Products
2023-12-15 14:48:19.721 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (8ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM [Products] AS [p]
2023-12-15 14:48:19.737 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (13ms) [Parameters=[@__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [t].[ID], [t].[Name], [t].[Price], [t].[Stock], [t].[CreatedDate], [t].[UpdatedDate], [t0].[ID], [t0].[CreatedDate], [t0].[Discriminator], [t0].[FileName], [t0].[Path], [t0].[StorageType], [t0].[Showcase], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]
FROM (
    SELECT [p].[ID], [p].[Name], [p].[Price], [p].[Stock], [p].[CreatedDate], [p].[UpdatedDate]
    FROM [Products] AS [p]
    ORDER BY (SELECT 1)
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t1].[ID], [t1].[CreatedDate], [t1].[Discriminator], [t1].[FileName], [t1].[Path], [t1].[StorageType], [t1].[Showcase], [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [p0].[ProductsID]
    FROM [ProductProductImageFile] AS [p0]
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT [f].[ID], [f].[CreatedDate], [f].[Discriminator], [f].[FileName], [f].[Path], [f].[StorageType], [f].[Showcase]
        FROM [Files] AS [f]
        WHERE [f].[Discriminator] = N'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS [t1] ON [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID] = [t1].[ID]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[ID] = [t0].[ProductsID]
ORDER BY [t].[ID], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]

2023-12-15 14:50:19.354 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (34ms) [Parameters=[@__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [t].[ID], [t].[Name], [t].[Price], [t].[Stock], [t].[CreatedDate], [t].[UpdatedDate], [t0].[ID], [t0].[CreatedDate], [t0].[Discriminator], [t0].[FileName], [t0].[Path], [t0].[StorageType], [t0].[Showcase], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]
FROM (
    SELECT [p].[ID], [p].[Name], [p].[Price], [p].[Stock], [p].[CreatedDate], [p].[UpdatedDate]
    FROM [Products] AS [p]
    ORDER BY (SELECT 1)
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t1].[ID], [t1].[CreatedDate], [t1].[Discriminator], [t1].[FileName], [t1].[Path], [t1].[StorageType], [t1].[Showcase], [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [p0].[ProductsID]
    FROM [ProductProductImageFile] AS [p0]
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT [f].[ID], [f].[CreatedDate], [f].[Discriminator], [f].[FileName], [f].[Path], [f].[StorageType], [f].[Showcase]
        FROM [Files] AS [f]
        WHERE [f].[Discriminator] = N'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS [t1] ON [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID] = [t1].[ID]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[ID] = [t0].[ProductsID]
ORDER BY [t].[ID], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]

SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM [Products] AS [p]
2023-12-15 14:51:33.097 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (0ms) [Parameters=[@__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [t].[ID], [t].[Name], [t].[Price], [t].[Stock], [t].[CreatedDate], [t].[UpdatedDate], [t0].[ID], [t0].[CreatedDate], [t0].[Discriminator], [t0].[FileName], [t0].[Path], [t0].[StorageType], [t0].[Showcase], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]
FROM (
    SELECT [p].[ID], [p].[Name], [p].[Price], [p].[Stock], [p].[CreatedDate], [p].[UpdatedDate]
    FROM [Products] AS [p]
    ORDER BY (SELECT 1)
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t1].[ID], [t1].[CreatedDate], [t1].[Discriminator], [t1].[FileName], [t1].[Path], [t1].[StorageType], [t1].[Showcase], [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [p0].[ProductsID]
    FROM [ProductProductImageFile] AS [p0]
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT [f].[ID], [f].[CreatedDate], [f].[Discriminator], [f].[FileName], [f].[Path], [f].[StorageType], [f].[Showcase]
        FROM [Files] AS [f]
        WHERE [f].[Discriminator] = N'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS [t1] ON [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID] = [t1].[ID]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[ID] = [t0].[ProductsID]
ORDER BY [t].[ID], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]

SELECT [t].[ID], [t].[Name], [t].[Price], [t].[Stock], [t].[CreatedDate], [t].[UpdatedDate], [t0].[ID], [t0].[CreatedDate], [t0].[Discriminator], [t0].[FileName], [t0].[Path], [t0].[StorageType], [t0].[Showcase], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]
FROM (
    SELECT [p].[ID], [p].[Name], [p].[Price], [p].[Stock], [p].[CreatedDate], [p].[UpdatedDate]
    FROM [Products] AS [p]
    ORDER BY (SELECT 1)
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t1].[ID], [t1].[CreatedDate], [t1].[Discriminator], [t1].[FileName], [t1].[Path], [t1].[StorageType], [t1].[Showcase], [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [p0].[ProductsID]
    FROM [ProductProductImageFile] AS [p0]
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT [f].[ID], [f].[CreatedDate], [f].[Discriminator], [f].[FileName], [f].[Path], [f].[StorageType], [f].[Showcase]
        FROM [Files] AS [f]
        WHERE [f].[Discriminator] = N'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS [t1] ON [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID] = [t1].[ID]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[ID] = [t0].[ProductsID]
ORDER BY [t].[ID], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]

2023-12-15 14:52:07.969 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (6ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM [Products] AS [p]
2023-12-15 14:52:07.981 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (9ms) [Parameters=[@__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [t].[ID], [t].[Name], [t].[Price], [t].[Stock], [t].[CreatedDate], [t].[UpdatedDate], [t0].[ID], [t0].[CreatedDate], [t0].[Discriminator], [t0].[FileName], [t0].[Path], [t0].[StorageType], [t0].[Showcase], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]
FROM (
    SELECT [p].[ID], [p].[Name], [p].[Price], [p].[Stock], [p].[CreatedDate], [p].[UpdatedDate]
    FROM [Products] AS [p]
    ORDER BY (SELECT 1)
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t1].[ID], [t1].[CreatedDate], [t1].[Discriminator], [t1].[FileName], [t1].[Path], [t1].[StorageType], [t1].[Showcase], [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [p0].[ProductsID]
    FROM [ProductProductImageFile] AS [p0]
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT [f].[ID], [f].[CreatedDate], [f].[Discriminator], [f].[FileName], [f].[Path], [f].[StorageType], [f].[Showcase]
        FROM [Files] AS [f]
        WHERE [f].[Discriminator] = N'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS [t1] ON [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID] = [t1].[ID]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[ID] = [t0].[ProductsID]
ORDER BY [t].[ID], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]

SELECT [t].[ID], [t].[Name], [t].[Price], [t].[Stock], [t].[CreatedDate], [t].[UpdatedDate], [t0].[ID], [t0].[CreatedDate], [t0].[Discriminator], [t0].[FileName], [t0].[Path], [t0].[StorageType], [t0].[Showcase], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]
FROM (
    SELECT [p].[ID], [p].[Name], [p].[Price], [p].[Stock], [p].[CreatedDate], [p].[UpdatedDate]
    FROM [Products] AS [p]
    ORDER BY (SELECT 1)
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t1].[ID], [t1].[CreatedDate], [t1].[Discriminator], [t1].[FileName], [t1].[Path], [t1].[StorageType], [t1].[Showcase], [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [p0].[ProductsID]
    FROM [ProductProductImageFile] AS [p0]
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT [f].[ID], [f].[CreatedDate], [f].[Discriminator], [f].[FileName], [f].[Path], [f].[StorageType], [f].[Showcase]
        FROM [Files] AS [f]
        WHERE [f].[Discriminator] = N'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS [t1] ON [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID] = [t1].[ID]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[ID] = [t0].[ProductsID]
ORDER BY [t].[ID], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]

2023-12-15 14:54:56.032 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (3ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM [Products] AS [p]
2023-12-15 14:54:56.043 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (8ms) [Parameters=[@__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [t].[ID], [t].[Name], [t].[Price], [t].[Stock], [t].[CreatedDate], [t].[UpdatedDate], [t0].[ID], [t0].[CreatedDate], [t0].[Discriminator], [t0].[FileName], [t0].[Path], [t0].[StorageType], [t0].[Showcase], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]
FROM (
    SELECT [p].[ID], [p].[Name], [p].[Price], [p].[Stock], [p].[CreatedDate], [p].[UpdatedDate]
    FROM [Products] AS [p]
    ORDER BY (SELECT 1)
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t1].[ID], [t1].[CreatedDate], [t1].[Discriminator], [t1].[FileName], [t1].[Path], [t1].[StorageType], [t1].[Showcase], [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [p0].[ProductsID]
    FROM [ProductProductImageFile] AS [p0]
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT [f].[ID], [f].[CreatedDate], [f].[Discriminator], [f].[FileName], [f].[Path], [f].[StorageType], [f].[Showcase]
        FROM [Files] AS [f]
        WHERE [f].[Discriminator] = N'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS [t1] ON [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID] = [t1].[ID]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[ID] = [t0].[ProductsID]
ORDER BY [t].[ID], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]

2023-12-15 14:55:32.517 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (0ms) [Parameters=[@__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [t].[ID], [t].[Name], [t].[Price], [t].[Stock], [t].[CreatedDate], [t].[UpdatedDate], [t0].[ID], [t0].[CreatedDate], [t0].[Discriminator], [t0].[FileName], [t0].[Path], [t0].[StorageType], [t0].[Showcase], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]
FROM (
    SELECT [p].[ID], [p].[Name], [p].[Price], [p].[Stock], [p].[CreatedDate], [p].[UpdatedDate]
    FROM [Products] AS [p]
    ORDER BY (SELECT 1)
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [t1].[ID], [t1].[CreatedDate], [t1].[Discriminator], [t1].[FileName], [t1].[Path], [t1].[StorageType], [t1].[Showcase], [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [p0].[ProductsID]
    FROM [ProductProductImageFile] AS [p0]
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT [f].[ID], [f].[CreatedDate], [f].[Discriminator], [f].[FileName], [f].[Path], [f].[StorageType], [f].[Showcase]
        FROM [Files] AS [f]
        WHERE [f].[Discriminator] = N'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS [t1] ON [p0].[ProductImagesFilesID] = [t1].[ID]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[ID] = [t0].[ProductsID]
ORDER BY [t].[ID], [t0].[ProductImagesFilesID], [t0].[ProductsID]
